column5: I ordered Valerian Root tea. The price was a great deal, and shipment was really fast! I would recommend this seller to anyone, and I would definitely do business with them again.

Text: Great for your health
column5: Arrived on time.  What a deal !!! So glad I could find this product on amazon !  I used this when i feel like im getting sick  Thanks !

Text: Served its purpose
column5: I do not really like tea but I needed to drink it for medical reasons.  Shipping was really fast and the price was good.  I am sure those who like Sage Tea would love it.

Text: Suggested by Dr. Oz
column5: This tea was suggested by Dr. Oz on his show about how to sleep better. I suffer from insomnia  so I bought the wheat germ, Chia seeds and Valerian tea he said would help. Haven't used the wheat germ yet, the Chia seeds we are absolutely loving, especially on top of a crisp salad, but the Valerian tea tastes so horrible I can't even force myself to sip it while holding my nose! It has a real earthy, almost "manure" like taste. The woman he had try it on the show sipped it and said "Oh, that's not bad!" So I took a chance. I swear, they must have paid her to give it a tasty review. It's vile and I already threw all three boxes of it in the trash!

Text: Not even close
column5: This was a waste of money, the item was late, package was torn up,and the tea was terrible, not a good product in my opinion and bad handling.

Text: It warmed me up
column5: I did a little bit more research online before taking this tea One time I bought Senna tea out of the blue, just for the heck of it and decided to drink it one night and the next day I was exploding downstairs. So I decided not to do the same with this one. This tea should be taken carefully. It is used as an immune system booster. I think drinking it four times a week is good enough. I really enjoy the warming up effect it has. Although it is suggested to drink with a meal.

Text: Good Stiff
column5: My father has been drinking this tea for years. Its so good for you. Especially men.

Text: Good Tea
column5: I bought the tea for my mother who has asthma.  She said it tastes great and does wonders for her asthmas.

Text: Hawthorne Berries
column5: Received in good condition and in a timely manner.  Great for relaxing the heart.

Text: Rose Hip Tea
column5: Prompt Service and I'm grateful to be able to order my rose hip tea on-line, from a reliable source, instead of running around from store to store looking for it.

Text: Mom swears by it
column5: This was a gift for mom who had run out.  She swears by it for calming her stomach, says it still works.

Text: horrible taste & stinky
column5: i ordered this tea to produce more breastmilk after reading on forums how good it is. thinking that it is a very good item I ordered 4 box at one shot! What a mistake! I thought I could drink anything but this is the worst thing ever i ever tasted! Like few others say, it also stinks up your place. I dont know what to do with the whole 4 box, i wasnt even able to drink up the one single cup!

Text: Tasteless!
column5: I used to get "Juniper Ridge Juniper Ridge White Sage & Wild Mint Tea" and LOVE it with a hint of raw honey and I wanted to give this tea a try. Very disappointed- the tea was tasteless and not what i had expected.

Text: Horsetail grass tea bags
column5: Have purchased these tea bas before. I bought them in hope of having stronger . No real success, but will keep trying.  Received package in timely manner.

Text: loyal customer
column5: It is good and soothing to drink. I have not tried it too many times yet. I am sharing with my sister.

Text: Personal preference
column5: I had hoped this tea would taste better but it just tastes to me like I steeped weeds from the backyard.

Text: licorice tea
column5: Alvita changed their lea licorice tea not the same - but my daughter likes it.  She normally uses tea in her tea but she said she does not use tea in licorice tea - it is sweet enough.

Text: This stuff Smells so baaaad
column5: This tea smells so bad I cant get the smell outta my house.  I know Valerian root doesn't smell like roses but this smell is putrid.  The affects work ok but not the best

Text: Nettle Leaf Tea
column5: If I can't find this at my local market or in a near by store, I order it from Amazon. I drink this tea after a night of drinking alcohol in order to help cleanse my liver.

Text: Not what they said it is
column5: I purchased this tea because I was told that it helps with excess gas but this tea has made worsen my gas problem. I am very disappointed with the purchase

Text: Hated it
column5: This review is about the product the seller was great! I heard it was good for sleep couldn't find it local so i bought it here. It stunk up my house, taste awful. save your money and buy any other tea out there.

Text: Nasty stuff
column5: This stuff taste the worse, no sweetner helps and it stinks up the place Stay away from this stuff, what a waste of money.

Text: Pond water would taste better..
column5: Stale, tastless crap. Dont bother. The hassle to return is riduclous, you have to pay and it has to be thrown out anyway, Why put customer thru all this for cheap little item.

Text: No taste or flavor
column5: I had a hard time drinking this tea as it tastes like cardboard! There's no taste or flavor. I don't know if it actually works to strengthen the uterus as I wasn't able to make myself have it for the couple of months required. I'm not sure if all raspberry tea tastes like this or just this brand.

Text: Stale
column5: I think these had been sitting around in a warehouse for a long time, because it took them a long time to send it to me and, when I got it, the tea tasted like cardboard. I've had red rasberry leaf tea before, so I know it's not supposed to taste like this

Text: feel better
column5: It seems like this product is working as I do feel better. Will probably order some more.  Good service after their stock was replaced. M. Weiner

Text: tea OK, postage way too high
column5: The sage tea is OK, but I was surprised that for 2 boxes from the same sender was I charged double the postage -- the tea weighs next to nothing.  Why not charge for the actual weight instead of a set price for each item?

Text: nice product
column5: In ayurvedic medidicne and in yoga exxercises some times you need to use herbal meds for balancing the chakras and energy channels, so this is one of the needed ones  but please use under instruction of your yoga and ayurvedic teacher

Text: Add honey?
column5: Are you supposed to avoid sugars if you have a urinary tract infection?

Text: Horsetail Grass Tea
column5: Too early to know.  I was recommended that this product helps out the joints.  I have been enjoying the tea going on one week.

Text: Disgusting!
column5: This tea tastes nasty.  Maybe I just dont like sage but it made me gag!

Text: Do not order this product .
column5: It has been over three weeks and I still have not received this product.  And, they have charged me for it already

Text: Don't pay for "expedited" delivery
column5: I paid over $13.00 for "expedited" delivery and the product still took FIVE days to arrive. Would not buy from them again.

Text: N/A
column5: I only used two maybe three tea bags and got pregnant - can not drink during pregnancy.  Not a bad taste, but I'm not a big tea fan either.

Text: tasty Maybe beneficial
column5: My midwife recommended this product, and I drank it throughout my second and third trimesters. My labor was slow, but I experienced nothing you might really call pain (pressure and some discomfort) all the way to 9 centimeters. Then I pushed 3 times and my son was born. I'm not saying for sure that it was the tea but I didn't have labors like this with my other two.  At any rate, it's tasty and not harmful. Just remember to tell your midwife or doctor that you're using it. I still drink it just cause I like it.

Text: Menopause Relief
column5: I wanted a natural product to help with hot flashes and night sweats. This makes an INCREDIBLE difference in my quality of life and sleep.  I had significant decrease in symptoms almost immediately.  I let it steep in my cup for about 5 minutes.  I had trouble with the taste so I add sugar and a little peppermint extract and it is a very pleasant drink.  I have a cup morning and evening and now am able to sleep much better. I also find I am not exhausted and dont have that anxious feeling. I would advise anyone to try this as it has helped me so much.

Text: Mild sweet tea
column5: I've been watching the new Dr. Oz show and he recently recommended nettle tea. So I bought some and this happened to be the brand I chose. Nettle leaf tea is mild and sweet (I augment by using honey). Not absolutely sure of its benefits. It's touted as good for being a diuretic thereby keeping your kidneys clear and keeping bladder infections and kidney stones at bay. It's also suppose to help with arthritis. Dr. Oz had commented that it's suppose to help with head hair growth. I recommend it if for no other reason in that it's pleasant for those who like a less bitter type of tea. Alvita uses minimal packaging. The tea is in simple bags without strings or tags and smelled very fresh upon opening.

Text: Really works for hayfever (allergies)
column5: Was told by a friend to try Nettle tea for allergies. Brought it & it works great & quickly. Long time allergy suffer who loves Nettle tea. I'm able to use it & stopped all the other medications .

Text: Very high quality tea
column5: Many of the common brands of herbal teas are not palatable to me.  This one is very good.  I enjoy it.  Easy on the palette and easy on the digestion track.  Yum!  Just like any high quality tea.

Text: A must have if you have painful heavy periods
column5: I had very painful cramps with Very Heavy bleeding that lasted for 5 days! and this cycle repeated every 21 days! So I would have a full period twice a month!! I was miserable and had to schedule my life around my cycle, because I was doubled over in pain or afraid of the embarrasment of bleeding onto my clothes! A friend recomended drinking this tea and my life changed!! I no longer have ANY Cramps!! the bleeding has subsided to 3 days with a normal flow and now my cycle is regulated to every 26 days or once a month. I have more energy and vitality and dont have to call in sick anymore!! This tea is blessing not only for pregnancy but for your menstrual cycle as well!! I tell every woman I know about this tea!! No need for birth control pills or other hormonal intervention. I love its pleasant light taste and enjoy drinking a cup a day.

Text: good stuff
column5: this red clover tea is worth my money, i have shed 8 pounds in 3 weeks, i know its not a diet tea or anything but, i drink this twice a day eat my 3 regular small meals, and a fruit or a rice cake or something lowfat, the tea coupled with better  eating habits and i ride my exercise bike and do a few stretches, lunges, lift a 5 pound weight in sets of 5's twice, for  about 15 minutes total2 times a day, nothing long and drawn out. before 3 weeks ago i honestly weighed 199, that's a lot of weight if you are 5'2, mostly in my butt and thighs. today i weigh 190, today meaning march 20, 2012. i have a long way to  go but that is a good start for me i love food it is hard but i find lowfat and sugarfree things to snack on. being overweight makes you tired easily, and the more tired you feel the more you will just sit around and when you sit around,  yep you tend to snack. my goal is 170 pounds, yea that is still a lot of weight but i am a realistic person, i will not  set myself up for a let down. if a should lose anything beyond 170 i will be very happy, i will update my quest on april 20, 2012. thanks

Text: Anecdotal evidence was too true for me!
column5: I drank 3 cups brewed with 2 tea bags each of this tea for the last few months of my pregnancy.  The amount of time I spent pushing my son out totaled 5 minutes.  My midwife had said there were lots of anecdotal reports of raspberry leaf tea causing easier labors but I was skeptical.  Obviously, my experience made me a believer! I found this tea's taste to be no different from the more expensive brands.  And I appreciate that the design of these teabags is less wasteful by not using strings, tags, or staples like most teas.

Text: Helps slow breast milk production
column5: Used this to help slow breast milk production when I was breastfeeding.  Worked well!  I drank 3 cups a day.

Text: Wonderful Tea.
column5: The tea helped me tremendously with getting a more restful sleep.  I do however, think you should take it when you know you have more time to sleep in.

Text: The best!
column5: I started drinking this tea after a Doctor of alternative medicine recommended it to cure a Yeast Infection. It worked! I did not had to do to a GYN to cure my yeast infection. Also, it helped me in other way. After I started drinking the tea I stopped craving sugar. Needless to say, I lost like 15 pounds while drinking it. Is amazing and very medicinal. It also helps me with menstrual cramps. I love it! You can find it here online or in any natural health food store near you.

Text: Not bad
column5: What can I say?  It's herbal tea, it tastes a bit grassy, but I like it.  I'd say try some before you buy a bunch of it because people either seem to love it or hate it.

Text: IT WORKS  FOR ME
column5: I use it to help jump start my weight loss regime. I sometimes flip flop up and down 8 pounds when I am not careful and i drink this tea for about 3 days and I shed it all. It is NOT a gentle cleanser though it will have your stomach turning and yearning but in 8-12 hours it does the cleansing job and it usually only does it for the first go round.  I would say go for it, if you need to get a jump start but DONT expect a good tasting tea very bitter. I DONT sweeten at all, I break the bags so i can swallow some of the bark in the tea as well. Good Luck

Text: GREAT for hot flashes!
column5: If you are looking for something natural to relieve (and possible stop) hot flashes--sage tea will do it. A glass in the morning and one at night and WOW what a difference it made!

Text: Sage tea
column5: Great product. Does not completely get rid of hot flashes and night sweats, but seriously reduces their number and intensity. I tried everything else and this is the only thing that made any difference. I now get reasonable sleep at night.

Text: UTI
column5: My husband is a paraplegic and was having UTIs constantly.  Since he started drinking a cup of this tea every morning, he hasn't had a UTI for a year.

Text: A must have for every pregnant woman
column5: I have always wanted a natural delivery.  My friend who's had 2 other kids told me to take red raspberry tea leaf to strengthen our uterus, birth canal, etc  I started drinking this during my whole pregnancy. 1 tea bag during the first trimester and the 2nd trimester and on my third trimester, i put 2 bags, the last two weeks, i drink 2 bags every meal  I only had to push for 1.5 hours. didn't feel pain during contraction until 10 CM. and no epidural

Text: Wonderful Tea
column5: I use red clover tea a lot and so do my friends, it helps cure insomnia and is also known as a cleanser of the body organs. I feel rejuvenated, refreshed and cheerful after I use it, which is between once a week and once a month.

Text: very pleasant flavor and good quality
column5: Milk Thistle is said to be good for the liver. It has a very mellow and pleasant flavor. I really enjoy drinking it. Alvita brand has always had good quality teas.

Text: No more breast milk!
column5: Let me start off by saying that I am not a tea drinker at all! I am more of a coffee person. Anyway, I decided that I was gonna dry up my milk supply and read somewhere that sage tea decreases milk supply. I went ahead and ordered this tea for that purpose. It says on the box that the tea is very bitter so I went ahead and added 1 teaspoon of honey. It worked perfectly. I do see that it has diminish my need to pump dramatically. I went from pumping 4-5 times a day to twice a day the 1st two days since I started drinking the tea. Yesterday I only did it once and today none so far. I am not in pain, though my breasts are still tender to the touch. I would 100% recommend this to any mother trying to stop her milk supply.

Text: I Love Sage Tea!
column5: I heard about drinking sage tea on the Dr. Oz show. Though sage is most commonly used in cooking, sage tea has been shown to boost alertness and mood, while decreasing anxiety, I was told. I find it very soothing. I was surprised that I actually like the taste. It's a woodsy taste just very appealing. It always makes me feel good afterward. The tea is caffeine free so I normally drink it in the afternoon or evening as I still need the caffeine coffee provides in the morning. This is a great product and I will most likely order it again.

Text: Great for colicky acid reflux babies
column5: We tried this as per our ped recommendation for our colicky acid reflux baby who just did not sleep well at all starting at about 2 months old 2-3 oz mixed with her bottle in before bed. From day one this worked great. Just enough to help calm and sooth her and definitely helped relieve some tummy problems and gas from colic crying. She still didn't start sleeping through the night but it definitely helped as she started sleeping at least one 6 hour block at night which is a godsend when you are only getting 3-4 hours total per night.

Text: Recommended by herbalist--love it.
column5: We've been drinking this tea for about 2 years.  It has a very mild taste--much like regular Lipton tea bags.  When I make Iced tea, I use 2 bags of this and 4 bags of Lipton for 6 quarts of water.  Makes delicious tea.  The herbalist told me it is very healthy to drink--has iron as well.  My kids love it too-as hot tea or iced tea.  This is not a raspberry flavored tea.  It is from the leaves, so you'll need to look elsewhere if you are looking for flavored tea. I like that there are no strings to deal with--or individual wrappers to peel off, just throw the whole bag in.

Text: Red Raspberry Leaf Tea
column5: I've a difficult time drinking red raspberry leaf tea in the past. I wanted to try it again during my second pregnancy for uterine health. This time I steeped it in boiling water, added lots of honey, and poured it over ice. It's still not the best tasting tea variety, but this particular brand seems a bit more palletable than some others. As far as it's potency/effectiveness, I suppose I won't know until the baby comes (although realistically I'm not sure I'll even know then). This price is amazing, too. I kicked myself for paying twice as much at a local health food store. I will definitely be buying my next box here instead.

Text: I use this tea for menstral cramps
column5: I use this tea for menstral cramps.  I drink a lot of it and it works fantasticly on cramps and mood.  Here is the catch - you can't expect to drink one cup and feel better.  I make big containers of ice tea - and I start drinking it all the time about two days before my period even starts.  Also, once my period starts, I try to make sure I have a cup every two hours- sometimes I have even more.  So again, it works but drink alot.

Text: This stuff is great!!
column5: This tea not only  aids in digestion, but this tea also has a calming affect..it's a very relaxing tea.I drink it alone or w/honey. I always have some in my pantry. Great after a long  stressful day. I definitely recommend this product.

Text: Birthing Miracle Tea
column5: I also had heard from my lamaze class that red rasberry tea was suppose to ease and assist in the birthing process(It is a uterine toner). Well, in my case it couldn't have been more true. I literally pushed 3 times and the baby was out, and that was my first baby. I drank the tea every day for the last two months of pregnancy, up to delivery day. I must say this time in my 2nd pregnancy i'm going to do it the exact same way. I recommend this product to any woman who wants to have an easier, shorter delivery.

Text: UMMMM!!!!!!
column5: I usually dont like black herbal tea, but this one i was able to sip on the whole cup without making a face. It is full of aroma and tastes much better than the usual herbal teas that i have tasted in the past. The Rose flavour is the best. How much it really calms u, god only knows, but the pleasure is unbeatable.

Text: Good!
column5: This is a really good tea.  I am drinking it during my pregnancy to tone the uterus.  Very good taste!

Text: Good Inexpensive Cleanser.
column5: This tea really works. Drink a big cup before bed and in the morning you will have to use the bathroom. Sometimes I have to eat just a little something before it kicks in, but it always works within 1-2 hours after waking up. It does not really taste that great, but it is okay. Definitely helps me keep my weight even. Personally I like Kleritea better (more gentle, tastes better) but that costs almost 4 times as much. So I stick to Alvita Senna Leaf Tea now.

Text: Great quality. Heathful product.
column5: A refreshing cold beverage and a soothing, perfect, hot cup of tea. Offers healthful benefits.

Text: Great TEA!
column5: I have purchased this brand of tea before and knew the quality was great but glad to have gotten a great price also!!  Delivery was prompt and service was great!

Text: delicious
column5: This tea is great.  I cook it in gallon batches and sweeten it with agave nectar and keep it in the fridge.  I guess it "worked" because my daughter was born after just 4 hours of labor and 20 minutes of pushing.  I'm still drinking it since I had just ordered another 3-pack of boxes of it the day before our baby was born.  My husband loves the tea too and he doesn't even have a uterus.

Text: nice flavor
column5: I have a friend who is a dandelion warrior.  Everytime she see's one, she pounces and that plant is history.  As a little joke, I ordered and sent her the tea.  To my surprise, she reported that she actually liked it, mentioning it had a rather nice smooth flavor.  Although that has not stopped her from still being a dandelion ninja, I give it 5 start just knowing that if she liked it - it HAS to be good!

Text: Sugar Buster
column5: We use it at night to lower diabetes sugar and it works.  My husband has been able first to reduce the medications and now has been off for 2 months.  Of course this is together with exercise, weight reduction and proper nutrition.

Text: Good night sleep
column5: I purchased these tea bags in hope for a good night sleep. The first night I drank it, I slept great.  I have continued to drink this every night and I still sleep well but I find myself waking up in the middle of the night once in a while.  I do find myself urinating more often so maybe it is cleaning me out.  No bad side effects, tastes good alone, no sugar or honey needed.  I recommended this to my family and co workers and they all love it.  I discovered this from Dr. Oz.  Hoping to continue to sleep well.

Text: soothing
column5: Maybe this is a placebo effect however, since I have been drinking this tea, sometimes in the morning and some times at night, I have felt more calm and my mood is somewhat lifted. The taste is fine- I sometimes add a little honey but it is fine as is. I will continue to use this tea. I do think it helps with your mood.

Text: GREAT TEA!!!
column5: Love the aroma and the taste. Orange honey goes great with it. I drink it daily. Seems to work great when I get any stomach issues  would highly recommend this product.

Text: Works, economical alternative to other 'diet' teas
column5: This stuff works. As reported by real doctors, do not use this all the time, only when needed.  Listen to what your body is telling you.

Text: Alvita Senna Tea Bags
column5: I love this tea and drink it all the time. The taste is very nice and I do not even have to sweeten it or use lemon, as it has an almost sweet taste all it's own. I take alot of medicine and have much trouble with my bowels. When I drink 2 cups of your Senna tea I am opened up within 2 hours.  Thank you very much, I would not use that much laxative. Pat Kamadulski

Text: helped increase my milk supply
column5: I found that this tea really helped increase my milk supply. It tasted a little funny at first, but I quickly got used to it. The price on Amazon is unbeatable, especially if you use subscribe and save.

Text: Good at first, but quickly became overbearing for me
column5: I bought this tea at my health food store because I thought it looked interesting. The name and the description really pulled me in, as well as the picture on the box. At first I was confused as to what the taste reminded me of, but then I realized it reminded me of pink Necco mints. I don't drink sugar in tea, but I think if I did and I had put some in this tea it would've made it overbearing. However, after drinking this tea once every day for a week or so, I'm finding it to be almost like a chore. I love the health benefits and this tea has actually helped me feel pretty good after drinking a cup, but the taste is becoming a bit overbearing. As I mentioned early in my review, the taste is reminiscent of pink Necco mints (minus the mint part, of course) but it can be hard for me to get through a cup of it because after awhile that Necco taste begins to remind me more and more of chalk. Yes, it definitely has a chalky flavor. I will still continue to drink this tea until the box is gone but I don't think I'll be buying any more of it unless it has some sort of miraculous effect on me later on down the box. Still, it was worth a try because it was nice at first.

Text: Shipping Charges
column5: The product was fine, but the cost of shipping was more than the cost  of the tea.  Won't make that mistake again.

Text: Light flavored tea
column5: I got this tea because it is supposed to help with PMS and supposedly helps "prepare" the uterus for conception. I figured it can't hurt, so why not? I think this tea is very light flavored. I usually put some honey in it and it goes down great. As for the rest, I've only been using it (3 times a day) for the past 7 days and haven't gone a full cycle yet, so I don't know if it really does work for PMS yet or not.

Text: A great product, you must try!
column5: I study plants and I am into alternative healing.  I learned about Mullein a number of years ago and found that it's very useful for sinus, cold and flu issues.  Often times I have treated many of my friends with it to help them get back to feeling well.  This particular brand is high quality and good medicine.  I highly recommend buying this tea as we all need to get away from Western medicine as much as we can when other opportunities are out there.  The idea is to stay in balance and not get extremely sick by using products like this early on when symptoms first start developing.  I think you will find this product very useful and effective. *  Please note: Do not mix to many herbs and or prescriptions medicines as they can counteract and amplify the strength or effect of the meds or herbs.

Text: Great stuff
column5: I love this stuff. It has really helped me with a lot of things. I absolutely swear by it. I probably drink this tea at least once a week. Sometimes several times a day if I feel the need.

Text: amazing! .
column5: I purchased this item a month ago and i drink a cup morning and night. I love it! I drink it with clover honey

Text: Great herbal tea for cramps
column5: My mother-in-law recommended this tea to me to help me naturally alleviate my menstrual cramps. I have to warn that the tea doesn't "kick in" for a couple of cycles, so don't drink this expecting a magic cure-all within the first cup. I used to be very dependent on Advil, Tylenol, etc. so this tea was a lifesaver. It's a very mild tea and you don't need a lot of sugar or honey in it. I recommend it.

Text: Dbp323
column5: Recommend it to all.  Lovely natural sweet delicate flavor and add some raw honey is a great cold kicker.  I loved it during a URI, upper respiratory infection and it was fabulous.  Soothed my sore throat and helped ease the coughing.  I now brew it for cold tea as well.  Very refresshing.

Text: Great quality Raspberry Leaf
column5: I trust Alvita's brand because all of the teas I have tried from them are pure and excellent quality. The Raspberry leaf is no exception. The taste is mild and it works like a charm to ease menstrual cramps. A must have during your moon cycle. Good value for the price. Also check out Yogi Woman's Moon Cycle, Herbal Tea Supplement, 16-Count Tea Bags (Pack of 6)

Text: This is great quality tea
column5: I drank this tea after my first trimester of pregnancy for its numerous health benefits.  It is pure red raspberry leaves and great organic package.  They are  not individually packaged, they come in a foil lined paper lije package and there are no strings or tags, just steep add agave or honey to sweeten it is a little bitter but not bad and drink!

Text: Good Things Come in Stinky Packages
column5: I have very bad insomnia and panic attacks, and this tea calms me down and helps me to sleep. Research suggests that Valerian works on the brains in similar ways to benzodiazepines, and was used in the past as a muscle relaxant and for DTs. This tea has an obvious effect, though it takes about half an hour to kick in. I smells like crap, but if you mix it with mint tea, it isn't as noticeable. I don't see any problem with the flavor, it does not taste like it smells.

Text: Fenugreek Seed Tea
column5: I bought this product because I read on a couple other sites that it can help with head and chest congestion. I also read it is safe to use while breastfeeding. So I tried it. If I drink it on an empty stomache it does seem to help with my cronic nasal congestion due to allergies. I saw no difference with chest congestion. I only drank the recommended 2 to 3 cups a day. Maybe I would see longer or more results at higher doses. I have noticed that I do smell alot like maple syrup even 4 days after not drinking the tea. I do mix it with Honey, if not it tastes awful to me. I never noticed a maple syrup smell on my 3 year old breastfeeding son like another site mentioned might happen. He does only nurse a few times a day now tho. Overall I like the product and will continue to use it when I am feeling congested. I even recommended it to somebody I know.

Text: I'm a believer
column5: I ordered this product because of the Dr Oz show for anti-aging, a nice by product is I swear my knee pain has improved since I started drinking a cup a day, oh yeah and it taste good.

Text: great product for insomnia
column5: This is a great product to help with insomnia.  Really great.  Some do not like the smell or taste, but I actually love it.  Maybe it is an acquired test.  A+++ for this product, it is excellent.

Text: fyi
column5: "They found that two of the licorice compounds, licoricidin and licorisoflavan A, were the most effective antibacterial substances. These substances killed two of the major bacteria responsible for dental cavities and two of the bacteria that promote gum disease. One of the compounds -- licoricidin -- also killed a third gum disease bacterium. The researchers say that these substances could treat or even prevent oral infections." file:///Users/roaeja/Desktop/Health/Dried%20licorice%20root%20fights%20the%20bacteria%20that%20cause%20tooth%20decay%20and%20gum%20disease,%20study%20finds.webarchive

Text: Love spearment tea
column5: I bought this product and love the flavor.  A great and relaxing way for me to end or begin a day.

Text: It grows on you
column5: The first time I drank Fenagreek Seed tea I did not like the smell or the taste very much.  I added a very small amount of Stevia to sweeten it.  The more I drank it, the more the taste grew on me.  It is now my favorite tea by a long shot!

Text: Senna Leaf tea
column5: A friend suggested this as I have been taking pain medication which tends to bind the bowels. He told me that this would help keep me regular. He was so right. A cu p of Senna Tea with my dinner has been better then metamucel for regularity. It tastes good, and I recommend it to anyone who has constipation problems due to medications. If you eat out, you can take the tea bag with you and ask for a cup of hot water to steep your tea in, and you do not have to worry about missing a dose.

Text: I'll pass
column5: Not enough flavor, murky brown color, lacking in aroma. I enjoy other varieties from this line but prefer a different brand of rose hip tea. I'd drink it over regular black tea though.

Text: Best tasting/effective
column5: After reading reviews from baby sites, I was ready to get my red raspberry leaf tea on and strengthen my uterus and I was so excited that I got the first one I saw, which was the Alvita brand. I love the flavor, just LOVE the flavor, but I read more reviews and a lot of women gave the Traditional Medicinals better reviews so I after I ran out of the Alvita I purchased the TM. I have to say, the Alvita has a stronger tea taste and I actually got contractions when I drank it. I'm only 37.7 weeks along, but I have to say that I think this tea will help move my labor along quite well. I'll update this review later with how it went. UPDATE 3/28/2012:  I totally forgot to add my update! Well, as I'd previously believed, this tea helped me tremendously through my labor. I had my beautiful baby boy on December 12th. I had a 17 hour labor because my bag of waters prematurely ruptured and I wasn't dilating the way I was supposed to. I had to be put on pitocin (without meds for the first 14 hours) then I got the meds and then got the epidural about 45 minutes before I actually gave birth. Let me tell you, I only pushed for about 20 minutes and I was done. I attribute that 100% to the tea. I had friends who didn't drink the tea and were in labor for very short periods but pushed way longer. Also, my uterus went down very quickly and I stopped bleeding quickly as well, I forgot how soon but the doctors and nurses were amazed. I'd definitely drink it again next time around.

Text: People Either Love or Hate Valerian!
column5: I love Valerian and I love it's earthy smell! But just because a previous reviewer hated the smell and threw a tantrum, (which is ironic because Valerian is used for its relaxing properties) doesn't mean it doesn't work! Keep that in mind when making your decision to purchase a natural product! Valerian is not like raw garlic! It's simply a very safe and effective herb which, to me, has a wonderful smell!

Text: stinky tea
column5: Seems to help, I sleep well and if I do wake up I'm not long getting back to sleep.  I ordered two boxes and I'm about to buy two more.

Text: A very fine Tea
column5: This tea was very good. I was Very happy I got it. A tea that is so good for you and will help many things in your body. My breathing felt better after the first cup. I will be buying more again soon. Doug in Calif

Text: rose hip tea
column5: I ordered this to serve at a "tea" where I was speaking about roses.  It was a hit with those who were brave enough to try it.

Text: Please get past the taste.
column5: You can compare it to unsweetened black tea, but palpable and soothing.  It is one of nature's best blood purifiers in addition to being great for women anytime.  It's great year round and for flu season, and you can ice it too.  Sweeten it up with a bag of chamomile or red clover. Spearmint & peppermint tea compliment it well too -- or add value to that flavored stuff from the supermarket w/this. You can drink this like water and I can't say enough about how good this tea is for well being, you'll probably instantly feel better.

Text: Fenugreek Seed Tea.
column5: Its a nice wind down at night.  Taste takes some getting used to but not too bad.  Sweeten with a litte honey.  The health benefits make up for the taste.  The product arrived as reported.

Text: Good
column5: I bought this because I heard about the benefits of Sage tea. I got used to the taste pretty quickly and love to pour it in a glass of ice to enjoy during the summer days. I took a star off because I've been drinking it for several weeks and I'm not seeing the work of benefits that is claimed of Sage tea (but then, I've always believed that you lose some benefits when the teas are in bags as opposed to still being in leaf form?).

Text: Sage tea definitely promotes a good night's sleep.
column5: It was touted by a friend as a sleep inducer, so I tried it and it works.  It tastes kinda mediciney, but it definitely does the job.

Text: Not as rose-flavored as you might think, but still good
column5: I bought this tea thinking it would taste like a rose. I was only half right. While the rose flavor is still there, you have to really search for it. I think it takes a few cups to do that because this is primarily a fruity tea. After you knock the first few cups down and find the subtle rose flavor, you'll find that it tastes like what a rose would taste like if it were a fruit. Which is basically what rose hips are. After drinking this entire box, I found that I really liked it. I was sad when the box was gone and I do intend to get some more soon. Just as an added note, I feel this needs to be mentioned. If you're like me and like to suck on the teabag, I do not recommend doing it with this tea! The bags themselves are not very thick and will break and you will have an explosion of mushy rose hips in your mouth!

Text: Good price for the quantity :)
column5: It came in a timely fashion & it was a good price for the quantity I received. This tea is good for occasional constipation or to help your body along when it feels irregular.

Text: Senna Leaf
column5: I used a higher priced senna for several years and out of the need to economize I tried alvita. Works just as well and is not individually wrapped as the others are and for me it's just one less thing I have to do considering I fix this every evening for me and hubby  I have medical problems so anything that saves me extra step I'm happy for it

Text: Nasty tea debris everywhere!
column5: When I opened this alot of the tea sacks were broken and the tea emptied out and spilled everywhere. I steeped some inside my cup and noticed that all sorts of the tea leaves had come out (I even took a picture and posted it under customer pics) and when I sipped my drink, tea leave crumbs got inside my mouth! I havent noticed any effect from the tea though but I have only used it for a few days so maybe it takes awhile. However, if they'd be able to keep the sacks closed that would help alot!

Text: Delicious Tea
column5: I love this tea. It is delicious. It came in a timely manner and I was very pleased.

Text: I drink this for arthritis pain
column5: and something seems to be working! It could be this alfalfa tea which tastes just like alfalfa tea. My aunt has pain too and does not like to be without this tea.

Text: Relaxing
column5: This tea works for me.  It calms down my anciety and makes me sleep better.  It may not work for everyone.  Thank you!

Text: Sage Tea - helping with hot flashes
column5: When I bought the first box I had a cup of tea every night and thought the hot flashes subsided a bit, so I bought another box.  The second box, not so much.  I am not sure if the tea builds up in your system and stops working or if it is just me.  The tea does not have a bad taste, doable for its purpose.  Sage tea has been recommended by many as a means of cutting down hot flashes, vs taking meds that can be linked to cancer.  Give it try, it might work for you.

Text: great product
column5: I bought this for treating symptoms of menopause.  It has been a life saver.  thank you

Text: Awesome Tea
column5: I bought this Tea for my girlfriend who is ery health conscious. So far she is loving it and it tastes good too. :)

Text: Dr Oz recommended!
column5: Dr. Oz recommended fenugreek tea for your digestive track,(not this brand specifically). It was a good introduction.  Personally, don't care for the taste by itself, but with a bit of honey,yum! Will purchase again.

Text: Red Clover Tea
column5: I purchased this tea because it is recommended for helping women's PMS symptoms and menopause symptoms.  I've only had one cup of it, so I can't say if it has helped my symptoms or not.  I have purchased other teas of this brand.  I would recommend their teas.  I wasn't crazy about the taste of the red clover, but that is just my personal opinion.  It's a little bitter but bearable.  Add some sugar and you're good to go.

Text: Wonderful company!
column5: I didn't realize it but my tea wasn't arriving as promptly as suggested. The company also noticed and sent a box out immediately! WOW! I was very impressed!

Text: What I needed
column5: The tea has a mild, pleasant flavor and is easy to combine with others, without overpowering the mix. I've just moved to a new town, and I don't know where to look for the teas I need. Buying online saved me a lot of headaches. The boxes I ordered arrived promptly.

Text: Interesting taste
column5: I read about the benefits of Pau D'Arco tea and decided to give it a try. It's hard to find this tea in the market. The Whole Foods near my house doesn't have it either. The taste of this herbal tea is interesting: it's got a hint of sweetness with a very slight medicinal bitterness. Feels quite dry and alkaline to me. Color is light brown. Not particularly delightful or tasty, neither does it have a strong, captivating aroma like the Japanese roasted green tea - it's just weird beyond description. Reminds me of dried summer leaves. Not unpleasant though; I am still glad that I tried it!

Text: Saw this on Dr. OZ for eliminating crows feet
column5: I watched Dr. OZ on television and he was explaining how to minimize and/or avoid crows feet. His advice? Drinking Fenugreek tea, taking L-Arginine supplements and getting a good nights' sleep (6 hour min.). Well, I am going to give it a shot. This tea has an interesting taste-not your typical tea but not bad. It tastes pretty good with a bit of honey added actually. I wasn't able to find this tea in any local supermarkets but here it is on Amazon. Seems they have everything!

Text: Great Tea, Great Price
column5: Tea comes in bags inside a large foil lined pouch.  There are 2 bags 'attached', and you peel them apart to use one.  They are not individually wrapped, and they do not have strings.  Strong flavor, great price.

Text: Sage Tea helps with night sweats
column5: I have one cup a day and it really decreases my night sweats. I'm in amazement at how much it helps! The taste isn't great, but I don't think it's as bad as some other reviews have said. If you're concerned about the taste, you can use some sage from your spice cabinet and make a cup. It tastes pretty much the same, but it didn't seem cost effective to use the sage you buy in the spice aisle.

Text: Yes it does have an odor that some will find disagreeable, but it works for me and I will continue to purchase it
column5: I read some of the reviews on here and I almost didn't purchase.  But I reached a point where due to my erratic work schedule, trying to fit in my studying time and completing assignments, my sleep pattern was disrupted and it was affecting my mood and concentration.  So I bit the bullet and purchased this at a local B&M store.  When I got home after work, I boiled some water and opened the package.  I noticed that this tea was packaged in a plastic bag so I guess it did has a pungent smell.  I opened the plastic bag and took a big whiff.  I was kind of disappointed.  It doesn't smell as bad as some of the other reviewers made it out to me but then again my nose has been wonky for some time so it could be me.  Yes I will admit that it does has a funky odor but it is not that strong to me.  To me, smells like this health food store I used to frequent in the Hyde Park neighborhood.  Very musky but weirdly comforting.  I have tried it with peppermint, turmeric (for a different affliction) and I have tried it plain with stevia and it taste okay to me.  I wouldn't say I have an iron stomach because I can easily get sick if food is left out in the open not at the proper temperature.  For me, this product took about two days for it to kick in and I am now able to sleep for a full eight hours straight instead of sleeping in fits of four hours here, wake up for about two hours, sleep for three, wake up for a hour and sleep for another four hours.  For those with sensitive noses and sense of taste, you have been amply warned by other reviewers.  For others, I say give it a shot or at least pair it with some other teas to dilute the taste a bit.  For example, mints like peppermint or spearmint will help.  Some folks will use lavender to mask the smell.

Text: It works for me and that is all I care about
column5: I read some of the reviews on here and I almost didn't purchase.  But I reached a point where due to my erratic work schedule, trying to fit in my studying time and completing assignments, my sleep pattern was disrupted and it was affecting my mood and concentration.  So I bit the bullet and purchased this at a local B&M store.  When I got home after work, I boiled some water and opened the package.  I noticed that this tea was packaged in a plastic bag so I guess it did has a pungent smell.  I opened the plastic bag and took a big whiff.  I was kind of disappointed.  It doesn't smell as bad as some of the other reviewers made it out to me but then again my nose has been wonky for some time so it could be me.  Yes I will admit that it does has a funky odor but it is not that strong to me.  To me, smells like this health food store I used to frequent in the Hyde Park neighborhood.  Very musky but weirdly comforting.  I have tried it with peppermint, turmeric (for a different affliction) and I have tried it plain with stevia and it taste okay to me.  I wouldn't say I have an iron stomach because I can easily get sick if food is left out in the open not at the proper temperature.  For me, this product took about two days for it to kick in and I am now able to sleep for a full eight hours straight instead of sleeping in fits of four hours here, wake up for about two hours, sleep for three, wake up for a hour and sleep for another four hours.  For those with sensitive noses and sense of taste, you have been amply warned by other reviewers.  For others, I say give it a shot or at least pair it with some other teas to dilute the taste a bit.  There are some great suggestions mentioned by other reviewers, like mint for example.

Text: Great product.
column5: this is a great product,it helps to relieve my bloating.I will order it again.Thank you.its better then anything else i have tryed

Text: Best  Peppermint Tea I've Ever Had !!!
column5: I have been drinking this brand of gourmet peppermint tea since I was a child. It is imported from Germany and has a very clean taste. I have used one teabag allowed to steep a little longer to yield an entire small pot of tea, which also makes it quite economical. Have tried many other brands of peppermint tea when I couldn't find this one and none measure up. This is the best!

Text: Great Organic Cayenne Pepper
column5: I love this pepper! I put it on everything. Adds just the right flavor and spiciness to most foods. My only problem is; my wife doesn't like spicy hot foods, and I want to put it on everything I cook for us.

Text: Hearty but bland.
column5: Thick, with a nice gravy and nice sized chunks of beef. I always add a good bit of cayenne pepper to spice it up a little. This makes a great too-tired-to-cook-too-cheap-to-call-for-a-pizza-delivery dinner.

Text: My husband's favorite!
column5: This is my husband's favorite soup because it's literally meat & potatoes (and a few carrots which he picks around).  We used to buy it all the time when we lived in Illinois, but now that we're in Florida, I can't find it anywhere  except here.  Thanks Amazon!

Text: Bland and unappetizing.
column5: Mushy potatoes and very soft beef, along with mushy carrots. It's a very simple and dull soup. It's hardly awful, but there are so many better soups out there in the same price range that it makes no sense to waste time on this.

Text: Not a good experience for amazon service but soup was fine
column5: The soup was fine, it'w what you buy at the grocery store.  However, I bought this in february and UPS left it at my door, which is what they usually do.  However, I didn't bring it inside for several hours because I was at work.  By then at least half of the cans had exploded due to the soup freezing.  I had to contact amazon customer service because they do not allow the return of food, so they had to make a special exception for this.  I would not buy this from amazon again.

Text: Delicious, Satisfying & Nutritious
column5: A bit expensive for a package but one Snakaroon goes a long way - it's moist, crumbly, sweet, chewy, fruity - it hits all sort of good spots and goes well with my tea in the morning.  Not an everyday breakfast substitute but a nice light sub for a not-so-hungry morning and a great backpacking snack!

Text: Not Chinese restaurant-style hot mustard
column5: I was hoping that the Roland Chinese Hot Mustard would approximate the ubiquitous and very, very powerful hot mustard served by Chinese restaurants with egg rolls and such. Alas, it was less like that than I'd hoped, and quite a bit like standard supermarket prepared mustard -- a slight kick, but nothing that will open your sinuses or tear up your eyes. After doing more online research, I'm next going to try something made from a mustard powder; several sources indicate that as soon as it's mixed, the potency begins to fall, so perhaps the Roland product is as good as can be found pre-mixed as a liquid or paste.

Text: yum
column5: This product is impossible to get in our area of Arkansas, so since Amazon is my "go to" site for products I was able to find it. Shared with family. Thank you!!

Text: Cute pasta - not just for kids
column5: I guess this product is primarily designed for children but I bought it to make a dish I had seen in a recipe book. It's perfect pasta and made a really elegant little dinner party dish.

Text: ooh another great British favourites
column5: I am amazed and pleased that Amazon is stocking this as part of prime delivery. This is one of many great British treats and such great value given that this is an imported product.  I have to travel over an hour and spend 3x as much to buy one and here it is all ready to be shipped.  This is exceptional value. the combination of hazelnut, sweet raisens and chocolate is so delicious and you really cant just have one segment - it is really to be eaten all in one session; try it with a cuppa tea (see PG tips) and you are getting a lovely British experience.

Text: Great!
column5: Cadbury's is by far my favorite brand of chocolate. I've tried all different types of chocolate from organic stuff, to imported stuff, to exotic stuff, to domestic brands to the very expensive stuff so it's funny that it's the proletariat everyman's Cadburys, which is in my humble opinion the best tasting. In their fruit and nut bar you get hard and soft. The nuts are crunchy and the fruit (raisins) is soft. Together you not only get gustatory pleasure but you get a textural pleasure from the mixture of something crunchy as well as something soft in your mouth. I have to admit that Cadbury's, which is tailored to the American sweet tooth is a mite too sweet and it isn't dark chocolate, which is "good" for your health. But who wants to live forever anyway? Chocolate is for pleasure, it's a hedonistic pleasure, if you're into health you should be eating sprouts and doing yoga, not eating this. But taste is in the end subjective, all I can do is to ask you to try it. For me, it is the best. These are the single bars. Unfortunately, they really should be two servings per bar because they are so big. I did buy this pack and you really should only eat 1/2 bar each time.

Text: 2 Months to expiration
column5: I ordered this item in September 2009 and they sent me the pack of 24 (3.5 oz) cholcolate bars having expiration date as November 2009. I am sure I can't eat all of these chocolates before October.

Text: Exactly as expected
column5: This was final purchase of the ingredients in an effort to duplicate at home the Iced Carmel Macchiato that my wife loves at our favorite Specialty Coffee Store. As it is the exact same product that the store uses, the drink turns out the same as at the store. Success!! And a Happy Wife. Always a good thing.

Text: Great for everything
column5: I found out from a coffee shop I frequent that this is what they use. I use it in my coffee now. I love it .and stopped paying $6 for a coffee everyday. It's also great on ice cream and anything else you want with caramel. Great product!!

Text: BEST CARAMEL SAUCE
column5: I dont know what to say besides the fact that this is the best sauce. I have tried ghirardelli, torani, ect. This one is so smooth and tasty mmmmmm  I make caramel mochiattos with it but it would be delicious on ice cream or any dessert for that matter.

Text: Delicious
column5: Loved these cookies. When I closed my eyes it was just as if I was taking a bite of lemon pie. A bit pricey to order these for myself.  Because of their taste and coming in that cute little tin they would be the perfect as a get well gift or baby shower etc.

Text: Not that great.
column5: I have to say that I was disappointed in the quality of chocolate in this basket. I purchased it to give as a gift but when it arrived there was more shredded paper than product, so I kept it and bought something else for our friends. I'm glad I did because the chocolate was "waxie" tasting and did not have a pronouced, rich, deep chocolate flavor one would expect from a company with the reputation Godiva has. The only thing worth while in the basket were the coffee mugs.  Do yourself a favor and buy some See's, Fannie May's or Rocky Mountain Chocolates instead.

Text: Very Effective Product
column5: I am very pleased with this manuka honey. It has helped with my digestive problems and also has kept at bay colds I totally recommend this product. I also gave my daughter a jar and it has helped her and her son  Wouldn't be without it Buy with confidence.

Text: Amazon purchase
column5: This is an excellent product with delightful benefits. I have chronic bronchitis,allergies, etc.  My allergy sneezes have lessened, sinuses improved. I have also noticed a slight weight loss. I  received my product within a week. I will continue to use my product for future benefits.

Text: sweet
column5: I use this instead of sugar on my morning oat meal.  It makes a big difference in taste. It's also very  healthy and has the right active #.

Text: GREAT HONEY!!
column5: I am able to get over colds faster when taking this, and I don't get sick as often. Tastes really good. And helped fight a bacterial infection I had that regular antibiotics weren't able to treat

Text: Not real manuka honey
column5: I ordered this last week and got it this week, tried it and it was not the real manuka honey.  The taste was really weird and lacks the floral scent of real manuka honey.  I've eaten manuka honey (comvita brand) before and this definitely not the same stuff.  When I got the honey, it was already crystallized which shouldn't be.  I would not buy this stuff if you want real manuka honey.

Text: Manuka Honey
column5: When ordering this honey I was a little bothered by the shipping cost, but the item arrived promptly and in great condition. It was still in liquid form and not crystallized like raw honey often is. I won't go into any of the many great medicinal qualities of Manuka honey as I'm sure that if you're already looking at this item, you're aware of it. I can say that the taste was interesting. Personally, I prefer the taste of Ulmo honey (why a four-star rating instead of five) - but I will be keeping this honey on hand for any medical ailments it may help.

Text: not manuka
column5: definatly not manuka.ordered it a while back and was greatly disappointed.  threw away the whole bottle.nasty stuff.  should have know better.can't get authentic manuka for this price.not even sure if it was honey at all.

Text: Simple - premade coffee
column5: I love this Korean gem, a stick of coffee, cream and sugar. Just add hot water and enjoy. Much better than north american instant coffee, and its form factor or single serve is perfect. I keep a few in my work back-pack, some in my desk and as a result always have a coffee at hand when I need a recharge.

Text: fine spelt berries
column5: If you need spelt berries in small quantities, this is a great choice.  If you want a better price, you will likely need to buy in 25 pound quantities, or more.  A great resource and a tastety one!.

Text: There's a reason the description doesn't list the ingredients (but I will).
column5: "  WITH  "   Olive Oil.  What does this mean?  How much of the oil in this mayo is olive oil, and how much is the (Omega 6) oil you're supposed to avoid? Ingredient options?  (A) Olive Oil. Then it'd be "Olive Oil Mayonnaise" instead of "Mayonnaise with Olive Oil."  (B) "Soybean oil, then olive oil."  In which case there is definitely less than 50% olive oil.  (C) "First olive oil, then soybean oil, then canola oil". Option (C) is the tricky part. Could there be as little as 34% olive oil, plus 33% soybean oil, plus 33% canola oil? My understanding of food labeling regulations is "YES." Were I Mitch Hedberg, I'd say "I'm not allowed to tell you the ingredients in this mayonnaise but there are three oils involved " Instead (and to conclude) Kraft.com made it easy to  cut and paste the ingredients: Ingredients: WATER, OLIVE OIL, CANOLA OIL, SOYBEAN OIL, VINEGAR, MODIFIED FOOD STARCH*, SUGAR, MALTODEXTRIN*, EGGS, CONTAINS LESS THAN 2% OF SALT, MUSTARD FLOUR, DRIED ONIONS, DRIED GARLIC, NATURAL FLAVOR, ENZYME MODIFIED EGG YOLK*, BETA CAROTENE* (COLOR), LACTIC ACID*, POTASSIUM SORBATE* AND CALCIUM DISODIUM EDTA AS PRESERVATIVES, PHOSPHORIC ACID. *INGREDIENT NOT NORMALLY FOUND IN MAYONNAISE. CONTAINS: EGG.  Size: 30 OZ  Upc: 2100002631 Bon Appetit!

Text: Convenient, tasty product
column5: The wide-mouthed jar makes easy access to the tasty, healthier version of Kraft's classic mayo. My husband and I really like the taste, and after using this can't even remember what the original tastes like! Being able to order on the Subscribe and Save plan has been a real boon and am sorry that's no longer an option.

Text: MMM Good
column5: This is definately NOW part of my pantry items to keep. The taste is sooo good and it is healthy . I'm loving it  .

Text: Mayo - its fine
column5: This is a mayo my hubby and I can agree on.  I prefer the cheaper stuff from Trader Joes but he likes "regular" mayo from the grocery store.  This is our good compromise - less fat and still a taste like "regular" mayo.  But its mayo - its not made for daily consumption!

Text: doesnt work
column5: I will be removing this product from my utility belt as it does absolutely nothing against peaceful demonstrators. Even at point blank range it had little to no effect. It just made a mess.

Text: Great Taste
column5: Pilao is my favorite coffe. I have tried several brands from around the globe but so far this is the best tasting. Not bitter, nice and smooth.

Text: Average
column5: I bought these since the Gevalia discs were all recalled. Definite taste difference. These taste more burnt and less silky but they get the job done until the Gevalia ones come back in stock.

Text: What a rip off
column5: $25 for ONE pack?!? The fault is mine for not reading the description more closely but for $25 I assumed I was getting a pack of 3 like usual when I order from amazon. Needless to say I will be returning the item and will be more careful when ordering in the future. Shame on this seller for jacking up the price to a ridiculous amount!

Text: not a good taste
column5: The taste on this product was very different than most espresso I have had in the past.  It seemed to lack body and a robust flavor.

Text: 23 dollars for a 16 count of mastro lorenzo t-disc
column5: is that the correct price 23.00 dollars for a 16 count of T disc when they cost 8.99 normally.. are you serious????

Text: Coffe good, seller bad
column5: Hey all-  This is probably the best espresso to come out of a Tassimo. That being said- NO T-Disk is worth more than 60 cents a pop, so this is overpriced. When you review an item and give it 1 star, you are rating the product as bad and it gives the wrong impression when you are simply upset about being ripped off. I agree with you though, this is currently outrageously overpriced considering I was getting three packs for something like 50 cents per serving.

Text: Rip off-Do not buy
column5: $23 for 16 discs when it is only $8.99 from Tassimo.  Could have sworn that the description indicated that one order is for 2 packs.  What a rip off!!!

Text: bad value
column5: I was very disappointed in this purchase.  I was use to getting 3 16ct packs for this price of $23.99, not just 1 pack.  I returned this item for a refund.

Text: Coffe is good but not price
column5: You can get these for under $10 on Tassimo.com.  We buy this espresso regularly- the taste is very rich and hearty.

Text: Better buys elsewhere
column5: We just bought Tassimo Gevalia Expresso 16 pack for $9.99 less 20% off at Bed Bath and Beyond.  Why would anyone pay this price?

Text: Adds excellent flavor!
column5: Used to be able to get charcoal seasoning at local supermarket.  On a whim looked it up on Amazon about 3 years ago, and there it was!  This stuff is great.  Just adds a real nice flavor to burgers, steaks and even chicken.  Wish it was more readily available though.  If you get a chance, grab it and try it; you'll be glad you did!

Text: Explanation Please
column5: Somebody needs to explain something to me. I purchased this particular large slice pepperoni, because that was what I wanted. What I got was pizza size pepperoni in about 7-1.75oz packages. So, maybe I got more pepperoni per ounce, it's still just not what I wanted. It cost more, too, than from the other seller. What I bought was from a different seller. Somebody needs to explain to me, why, after purchasing from the other seller, I go to my list of purchased items, and click on that item, it takes me to this page of, supposedly the item I wanted, at a much better price from a different seller! If the other seller couldn't fulfill my order with exactly what I wanted, why wasn't I notified? Now, this pepperoni will probably last till forever, except that it expires the end of the year.

Text: Amazing Herbal & Detoxifying Tea is now available!
column5: I got a sample pack 3 weeks ago & after drinking this tea, I feel I don't want to drink other tea anymore. The taste is mild & cool, taste much better than green tea. Because it's non caffeine, I can also drink this before bedtime & cleanse my system all night & wash it out in the morning. I like to be healthy very active in sport & this tea makes me more energetic when I play tennis. Because I believe in this product, I decided to sell them on my site as well [ ] Thank you Tad of Eco Vita for this amazing products. More power & God Bless!
Ten-Chi Cha has met all my expectations. After drinking it, I felt clean, refreshed, and energized. Ten-Chi Cha is A+++

Text: Great tasting
column5: I usually drink green tea and have used this tea during the summer for iced tea and love the taste.  Very refreshing and prefer this over the store bran green tea.

Text: Great tea!
column5: This is a great tea! I usually drink a green tea at night after dinner and alternate between this one and another I have. It has a great flavor, which to me is a bit on the nutty side. It kind of reminds me of Genmaicha (spelling?). I did ask my nutritionist about using it more frequently but she warned me about an ingredient in it called senna and advised to be cautious about taking in senna as it is a bit of a "laxative".

Text: this is something very new to me
column5: i especially liked to make it iced tea that has been turned to be alternative to water.

Text: Mmmmmmmmm
column5: Seriously, this (& the other donut house coffees) are simply the best. The chocolate flavor is there but not overbearing and no weird chemical taste that some flavored coffees have. Way better than Timothy's "german chocolate cake". All of Timothy's coffees have a bit of a weird chemical aftertaste to me. Gloria Jean's "swiss chocolate" isn't bad but it doesn't compare to this coffee. If you like chocolate and like flavored coffee, you'll love this coffee!

Text: One of the BEST flavored coffees!
column5: Chocolate glazed donut.  The flavor and aroma of this coffee is 100% on the mark.  Finally, an enjoyable, delicious, flavored coffee!  I have been very disappointed by flavored coffee made for Keurig machines.  Overall, many other flavored coffees have forgotten the flavor, with many tasting not only bitter, but day-old too!  Donut House Chocolate Glazed Donut Coffee is enjoyable, a real flavor winner.

Text: Awesome chocolate flavor - best I've ever had!
column5: This Chocolate Glazed Donut flavored coffee is honestly the absolute best chocolate flavored coffee I've EVER had in my 60 years on this earth! I made a travel sized mug of coffee and it was perfect! I should point out that I don't like very strong coffee (like expresso), so this was just right for my tastes. I do buy the bold Keurig coffees, however; mainly because I like making the travel mug size. I just wish this came in decaf so I could have it at night for dessert!

Text: YUM!! My Favorite!
column5: This is by far my FAVORITE k-cup! (so far!) That being said, this is NOT Hot Chocolate! There is not a strong chocolate flavor but a hint mixed in with a mild coffee. Not too stong of either. I do not care for Bold/Strong Coffee so if that is what you are looking for this aint it! On the other hand Chocolate Water and other comments are not accurate. Take a chance I think you will be pleasantly surprised! I personally LOVE it!

Text: Much better than expected!
column5: First off, I am not a fan of flavored coffee.  I usually find flavored coffee to have an artificial or chemical taste.  However, I am a fan of donuts and I will admit that the packaging made me think of a delicious chocolate donut.  I wanted to try it. I read the reviews here, which were mostly positive, and I picked up a variety box with this in it to try it. I was not disappointed! The first thing you notice as it's brewing is the smell.  It really does have a chocolate donut smell. I also like bold or dark coffee, and this isn't as strong as I'm used to, but this does well as a flavored coffee.  It has a slight cocoa flavor that is not overpowering.  I recommend brewing this on a small setting to get a more concentrated flavor.  Give it a try!.

Text: Best Chocolate Taste of all I've tried
column5: This coffee is awesome. getting ready to order more. It has the best flavor of any of the flavored coffee's I've tried. I don't even need to use creamer with it. It's a pleasure to look forward to having a cup. Love it!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Highly recommended to chocolate lovers.

Text: Delish
column5: As the other reviews stated, the Chocolate Donut flavor is definitely more aromatic than in the taste. But I swear the aftertaste is just like i took a huge bite of a chocolate donut. I only bought an 18 cup box at Bed Bath and Beyond earlier today, but i will definitely be ordering a bigger box soon. A very easy to drink cup of coffee for sure. It is on the lighter side, but I like that.

Text: Hit's the spot!
column5: Maybe it's because I'm on a diet and anything that isn't celery right about now would taste good but this is a yummy coffee! The chocolate flavor isn't over powering in fact you can smell it more than you can taste it, but overall really good flavor and richness.

Text: Delicious flavored coffee
column5: This coffee is absolutely delicious.  I use it as a treat with dessert, but great anytime as a pick me up! Highly recommend it!

Text: Amazing taste
column5: I ordered this box of coffee after tasting it in a sample pack and fell in LOVE. It is so good.

Text: One of the best K-cups to date!
column5: I am constantly trying new K-cup flavors/brands and while I won't go as far as saying this is the absolute best overall, it is one of the best I've ever tried.  As soon as you brew that first cup you will smell the amazing chocolate glazed donut aroma and it tastes just as good!  If you add creme and/or sugar to your coffee you will still enjoy the brewed in chocolate glazed donut taste. It is smooth, not bitter at all and just a great cup of coffee for everyday or for a treat to mix it up from a non-flavored blend.

Text: scrumptious!
column5: I'm not a coffee drinker, but I've had online friends rave about this excellent chocolate taste.  I believe all coffee drinkers will love it and never feel the need to go back to their regular type of coffee ever again.  Highly recommended.

Text: One of our two favorite sweet coffee k cups!
column5: We love this flavor! This and Timothys german chocolate cake are our two favorite sweet k cup flavors. They both have a very nice and smooth chocolate flavor. Woould highly recommend this flavor if you like chocolate and it is great with a little chocolate creamer.

Text: Mmmm  GOOD!!!
column5: I really, really like this flavor - just the right hint of chocolate -- without the donut!  Just wish it came in Decaf for my evening cup of coffee.

Text: Delicious!
column5: This coffee is delicious.  It smells like heaven.  The taste is not too overwhelming.  We will always have it on hand from now on!

Text: Yummmm perfect for chocolate lovers
column5: I you love chocolate and coffee this is for you.  It really tastes like a chocolate donut with out the calories!  That's a win for me!

Text: Very Tasty
column5: This is a very tasty flavored coffee.  The flavor is not overpowering, and provides an extra little kick of awesomeness.

Text: Great Coffee!!
column5: This coffee has now become one of my favorites. It has an excellent taste and is a great blend. It even fills the room with the smell of chocolate donuts!!

Text: Indistinguishable from regular coffee
column5: This makes a nice cup of coffee (if you like your coffee a little weak), but in a blind taste test there is absolutely no way I could tell this apart from a non flavored coffee.

Text: Not the strongest coffee out there
column5: The chocolate is more aromatic than flavorful. This is not a strong coffee, if you make it with using the 9 or 11 ounce brew setting on your Keurig brewer it is weak.  Using the 7 ounce setting it is okay but not strong.  5 ounce brew setting seems to be the best for coffee strength. I prefer a bit of kick to my coffee and when I make flavored coffees I want to taste the flavor as well as smell it. I'm glad I purchased a 5 cup sampler through Keurig direct and did not buy a box of 48 as sold here on Amazon because I will not be purchasing this flavor of K-cups again.

Text: COFFEE FLAVORED WATER
column5: IF YOU PREFER YOUR WATER WITH A SUBTLE TASTE OF COFFEE, THIS IS FOR YOU.  HORRIBLE, VERY LITTLE FLAVOR, WEAK.  THIS IS THE FIRST TIME IN SIX YEARS I AM RETURNING SOMETHING TO AMAZON. A TRUE WASTE OF MONEY

Text: Absolutely disgusting.
column5: This coffee smells and tastes absolutely disgusting.  It smells like sugared rubbing alcohol.  It tastes like vomit.  I have never disliked a coffee flavor so much before, and I am at a complete loss when it comes to explaining how it got such favorable reviews. I bought the item elsewhere and  cannot comment on the seller.

Text: Well pleased
column5: Item packed well for shipping and very attractive packaging, great gift, very pleased, would buy again.

Text: Better than Gum
column5: I purchased both the gum cigars and chocolate cigars for my daughters announcement. The chocolate cigars were classier and of better comparative quality. This is not to suggest that the chocolate is anywhere near gourmet quality but it was far superior to your other tobaccoless alternatives.

Text: I'ts  Girl..
column5: I am so pleased with the milk chocolate cigars I purchased for my Grandson to give his co-workers.  I checked other stores and party stores, and yours are far superior than any  My Grandson will be delighted and  proud to give them out for his new baby Girl .due July 10. Thanks again,to Amazon for a job well done they also shipped the date promised. I now know who to call when I need other such items. G'MOM ( Great Grandmother)

Text: Good idea
column5: A great idea and I would recommend it.  However, it would be nice if the cigars were a little bigger and more cigar shaped.  Overall though good idea and good product.

Text: Almost five stars
column5: Our office recently (and possibly misguidedly) voted a Starbucks machine off the island and replaced it with a couple of Bunn airpot makers. They're great for commercial coffee but that is also the problem: it tastes like mediocre diner coffee even when good beans are used. So I've taken matters into my own hands and picked up an Espressione Cafe Novecento espresso maker and have put it in the kitchen "on loan" to the company. My first few attempts at pulling a decent shot with fresh ground coffee convinced me that I simply don't have the patience to learn the proper technique so, as the machine came with a pod portafilter, I decided to give that a shot (so to speak). Illy had the highest number of positive recomendations so I settled on them for my initial foray. Simply put, I am impressed. The flavor is excellent, the output takes in the ballpark of 20-30 seconds a shot and has very good crema on about three out of every four shots. It can be tricky to properly seat the pod in the portafilter but moistening the pod first does help and that's a more a reflection on the filter design than the pod's. The primary reason I can't give five stars (although I'd do four and a half if I could) is that even the Amazon price works out to almost a dollar a shot so my double Americano in the morning is only slightly less than I'd pay my favorite barista. And she has a really cute smile. All in all, though, a very positive experience and I recommend the Illy pods.

Text: Great Convenience for Espresso Lovers
column5: Illy Dark Roast Pods provide a great-tasting cup of espresso with crema and without the mess of cleaning up all those grounds. The tin packaging is compact for easy storage, but I recommend keeping the opened pods in a vacuum container to maintain freshness. If you're willing to invest in two 18-pod tins, you can't beat the price on Amazon! For a slightly different great taste and individual packaging to maintain freshness, try Espressione as an alternative, though the individual packaging requires additional storage space in your cupboard.

Text: good flavor, ese pods work
column5: These ese pods work, not mess.  Flavor is quite good.  Not as good as fresh ground, etc.  For what it is, a good product, with a nice flavor.

Text: Espresso lovers heaven
column5: First time I tried illy espresso  6 yrs ago  while  on business trip  in Europe. Hard  to forget taste , illy Caffe Dark Roast PODs will satisfy any espresso lover , especially when Cleaning reduced to Zero. Highly Recommended.

Text: Easy to use, cheap, and actually makes pretty good espresso.
column5: So, I'll start by saying I'm sort of an espresso snob. I got an espresso machine after spending 3 days on the internet checking out the best ones and ending up with a great deal on a Francis Francis X3 FrancisFrancis! X3 Espresso Machine, Black Matte. I was wary of the pod idea and couldn't imagine getting real espresso from an air packed pod of really old espresso. Francis Francis had a canister to try in the package, so I broke down one day and just tried it. I must say, it was actually really good. The canister was a little old so the espresso was a little bitter but it had better crème and consistency of most any of my pulls. The Francis Francis machines are made for pods so I just put the little guy in and turned on the machine. Clean-up was easy, just pull the side paper and throw it away. I didn't have to wipe-up espresso dust off everywhere, clean espresso off the machine nothing really. Not to mention the price of these little things is much better than having to pay for ok/horrible espresso close to home or pay outrageous amounts for shipping. Also, Lilly makes many different varieties of espresso like medium (I left this same review for that variety), dark, decaf, etc. (not sure about other brands, I've just stuck with Lilly) So, in conclusion, I've converted  I'm a closet pod user and the ease of use and the fact that I can get 36 pods for less than a dollar a piece is great for me.

Text: weak
column5: I thought i was saving a bit of $ per pod by purchasing the Illy brand for my new Delonghi machine.  Espresso was weak compared to Starbucks.  I use 2 per large Latte with the Illy and one from Starbucks to make the same size.  Not much of a savings this way.  Would not purchase again.

Text: Not Up to illy's High Standard
column5: I am disappointed. They work as advertised: quick, clean, and easy. However, more important to me is taste. While individually wrapped, the freshness of beans ground just for that moment is missing. The pod itself uses less coffee than I would in a single shot. Since I more often will make lungos, the sheer lack of coffee volume produces a weaker drink. Instead of pulling twice as long, I pull it 80% as long for a short shot, but it takes longer to get it all into the cup. The crema is impressive, equal to any regular Illy. The cost-per-drink is poor. I already knew this, but hoped I would be impressed enough by the quality so as to tolerate the price. I regular buy cans of illy's dark roast whole beans for grinding into espresso. These ESEs are not as good as the real thing. Because of the high standard illy otherwise supports for its products, I cannot give my full support to the illy Caffe Scura Coffee, Espresso, (Dark Roast, Black Band), 18-Count E.S.E. Pods. --Brockeim

Text: Great ESE pods.
column5: I'm pretty particular about my expresso and I much prefer fresh ground to the pods. But fresh ground is messy and takes more time. I have tried a bunch of different pods on the market. These are by far the best I've had. They give a rich bold flavor that's still smooth and enjoyable. Compared to the Starbucks pods these are one star above at least. They are a bit more expensive, but after going back and forth between these, the starbucks ones, and a few other brands the price difference per pod is usually no more the $0.20. In my opinion it is well worth the extra $0.20 for a delicious cup of expresso. Often better even then what I get at various coffee shops. If your an every day espresso/latte/cappuccino drinker then you will appreciate the subtle yet noticeable higher quality of these pods.

Text: awesome
column5: People used to the usual american burnt espresso (AKA starbucks) need to taste illy's coffee.  Also, the POD system works well to deliver consistency for those less inclined to fuss over their own grind-and-tamp.
