column5: The first time I tasted this tea I thought WOW! That feeling has not faded. If you like tea, cinnamon, spice something to put a little honey and milk into you'll love this tea. It's a homerun.

Text: good hot drink with any meal or in between
column5: My husband and I like this with cinnamon tea with our evening meal and usually about 8:30 or 9:00 we each drink another cup.  It is really tasty and has a sweet taste to it, so you don't have to use a lot of sugar  or splenda with it. This is something we really enjoy. Keep up the good work.  Our daughter introduced us to this product and several other teas that you sell, but this is our favorite and hers also. I am a product reader so know what is in almost everything we eat.

Text: A wonderful surprise!
column5: I discovered this wonderful cinnamon tea at Au Bon Pain.  I am now going to buy it to have at home.  I love it.

Text: If you like Cinnamon
column5: I first tasted this tea at a local eatery. I had to order it so I could enjoy it at home. If you like cinnamon you'll love this tea. It's the perfect blend of spices and it curbs my sweet tooth. I look forward to getting it in decaffeinated.

Text: Okay  but nothing compared to the loose version available in tins!
column5: I have been a long time fan of the Hot Cinnamon Spice Tea, though I had only purchased it in the tin of loose tea bags. I am sad to report that the flavor is vastly LESS flavorful than the loose version and certainly not as tasty. While still better flavor than many teas, I was disappointed with this in comparison with the slightly more expensive tin version.

Text: Fall in a cup
column5: This is the best tea I have drank in a long time.  It is naturally sweet.  The aroma reminds me of Fall.

Text: Spicy Tea
column5: Tried this Harney & Songs Hot Cinnamon Spice black tea. The cinnamon is very fragrant & flavorful. This tea is very similar to  GOOD EARTH Original Sweet & Spicy tea. I prefer GOOD EARTH, I think the Good Earth tea has more flavor! You can also get Good Earth products on sale  sometimes on Amazon, making them a better value for the money.

Text: Care for a spot ot tea
column5: This product arrived today and I gotta tell ya its better than I expected! You ever walked into a store and smelled those cinnamon pine cones?Thats my best description of it if I drank tea w sugar I'm pretty sure this tea would taste like a version of those cinnamon red hots candies. Anyway, its pretty dang good!!! :)

Text: yummerific
column5: This tea is absolutely delish! I tried the wrapped tea bag version and I liked it so I ordered it in the sachet and it is soo much more flavorful. I liked it so much that I made up a batch of cinnamon cookies to go with it. This tea, a cookie and a good book equals heaven!!

Text: Great flavor
column5: Some teas smell great but when you taste them they are a disappointment.  This tea tastes terrific too. It's sweet without any added sugar - I guess that's from the sweet cloves. Whatever it is I love it.

Text: best tea
column5: This strongly spiced tea is heaven as a pick me up at 3 pm at work. My coworkers always comment on the delicious smell. You don't need any sweetener as the cinnamon itself is sufficient.

Text: My Favorite Tea, Hands Down
column5: I really love this Tea!! It's my "comfort food" of sorts. It's very tasty with a little sugar-spicy and yummy. This was a really great price for 50 tea bags.

Text: Great High Quality Tea With A Strong Cinnamon Taste
column5: I've enjoyed an Orange Pekoe and Black Tea blend for years.  About eight years ago, I was introduced to an Indonesian brand that was a blend of Orange Pekoe, Black Tea, and Cinnamon.  It was incredible!  However, it was bought at a discount store and I was never able to purchase it retail - despite my dogged attempts.  Ever since, I have been forced to go from one imitator to another looking for a replacement. Enter Harney & Sons Hot Cinnamon Spice which I first purchased at a specialty store that carried somewhat exotic products and have since purchased on Amazon.com.  What can I say other than WOW!!!!  This tea has such an INCREDIBLE taste.  It is almost indescribable how beautifully the black tea mixes with the cinnamon and orange in your tea cup.  I love the cinnamon taste so much, I actually OVER steep my tea bag in order to infuse as much of the powerful cinnamon taste as possible.  I'm sure many tea enthusiasts in the UK and here in the US would be aghast at the thought of over-steeping tea as normally you would be left with a strongly bitter cup as the black tea would infuse too much of its taste into the water.  However, this does not happen with Harney & Sons.  Instead, the only thing you get is a stronger and stronger cinnamon & orange taste.  I steep my tea so long that I often have to reheat my cup, but it is so utterly delicious (that would be the basking in fields of flowers with rainbows and unicorns kind of delicious) that I'm willing to wait another minute or two.  Add a little sweetener and a touch of cream and its TO DIE FOR!!! As you can see, I can't say enough good things about either Harney & Sons teas in general or the Hot Cinnamon Spice blend in particular.  I was so happy to find this tea - it truly blows away any brand that I've found - one of the many instances where you win when you pay for quality!

Text: Im in TEA Heaven!!!!!!!!!!!!
column5: My Mom bought this Tea and gave me a few bags to take home and try ..OMG, without a doubt one of the best Tea's I have ever tasted! Most tea's just taste like hot water. This one is soooo flavorfull..such a wonderful cinnamon flavor.  Tastes like you are eating a bag of red hots, and just a little bit of sugar and its so sweet! This is def my new obsession!

Text: Wonderful cinnamon flavor
column5: This cinnamon tea tastes slightly sweet even without honey or sugar.  When I ran out of the tea bags, I reached into my tea storage cannister and found some 2 year old tea sachet bags.  I tried them and they were still full of flavor after sitting unused for 2 years.  Makes a great gift too.

Text: Best tea ever
column5: I purchased this tea after sampling some from a co-worker.  It is a strong tea with a very powerful cinnamon taste, but its sweet with only a little burn.  Very good.  No need for cream or sugar in the tea.  Will purchase again.

Text: Best tea ever
column5: I have never had a tea that got better as it steeped over 5 minutes, but this tea gets more flavorful instead of bitter.  I do not have to add sugar or sweetener. As a diabetic this is very important. The cinnamon and orange peel is just heavenly.  If you like cinnamon and flavored tea, you are going to be in love with this one.

Text: go for the satchels in the tin, I guess . . .
column5: If you LOVE cinnamon, this is apparently the tea to buy, especially in satchels in the more expensive tin. Based on the rave reviews, I bought the economical box - and, for a gift to have on hand, the nice-looking tin . . . before realizing that the satchels in the tin are touted to taste better than the 50 bags in the box. Glad the gift tea should be better! I LIKE cinnamon - but to love these tea bags, it would help if you love cinnamon (especially if you enjoy Red Hots or hot spicy food). I usually enjoy my tea strong and with milk, but I suspect I'll be diluting this one with lots of milk. So far, I've found Harney & Sons tea to be high-quality tea - and cinnamon is healthy, so I'm okay with this purchase. But I don't plan to restock this zinger in my pantry :)

Text: Not the same as Hot Cinnamon Sunset, but still good
column5: This is a great tea, and if you have never had their Hot Cinnamon Sunset you will be none the wiser that it could be even better.  I fell for the price difference and decided to give it a try.  Truth be told I will buy it again because it is just so much less then the other.  But sometime I am guessing I will splurge and get the real thing.  Enjoy both, you will be glad you did.

Text: Simply Delightful!
column5: I found this tea in a most unorthodox setting - a pizza shop when I was sick and wanted something warm and soothing to drink in December.  Not only does this tea smell heavenly, but everyone around me asks what smells so wonderful.  When I tell them it is this tea, they can't believe it and want to try it.  I ordered the 50 packet box and need to reorder already as I keep giving these packets away and everyone who has tried it loves it!  The tea smells fabulous, is bold and tasty.  I tend to like honey in my tea, and find this is truly the best cup of tea around!  I love it and think if you are considering, you should give it a try!  You may want to check Harney and Sons website directly as they actually sell it for a bit cheaper, but be sure to check whether Amazon winds up being a better deal due to shipping costs.  Plus, if you prefer loose tea, the company's website offers that option as well.  Enjoy!

Text: Delicious and Festive
column5: My mother-in-law gave me some Hot Cinnamon Spice tea from Caribou Coffee and I loved it so I tried to find it online.  I was surprised to find that this tea seemed to be the exact same tea at a much lower price.  I decided to give it a shot and it is delicious!  I would definitely recommend this to tea drinkers and non-tea drinkers alike.  My husband, who is not much of a tea drinker was pleased to find that it had a rich, full taste, unlike a lot of other teas that he has tried.

Text: Love this tea!
column5: If you are a tea drinker and like cinnamon flavored things you will love this.  I  keep it on hand at all times.  You know how sometimes you really want a cinnamon   something? Usually something bad for you, try this instead. The flavor is perfect and most of the time it does the trick for me. And research has shown that cinnamon  improves the way our bodies handle sugar. That makes it even better. Love this tea! And if you are a tea lover, Harney and Sons has really good tea. You should give  them a try.

Text: Love this tea
column5: This tea is very popular in our house -- my husband panics if we're nearing the end of the tin!  I highly recommend it.

Text: great tea
column5: Recipients of tea found it to be excellent- I gave it as a gift and it was greatly appreciated and noted to be exceptionally good tea.

Text: Delightful!
column5: Love it!  I am an avid tea drinker (instead of coffee), and I love this flavor.  I bought one in a metal tin for myself and savor each tea bag.  The smell of cinnamon, allspice (and maybe cardamom?) are so cozy and flavorful. I decided to send this as a gift to warm up someone else's spirits.  It's particularly great for autumn/winter, but I enjoy it year-round.

Text: Best Cinnamon Tea Ever
column5: My husband and I both love teas of all kinds, but this one is the best for true cinnamon taste. Nothing from the grocery store will compare. It not only smells wonderful, but it has a rich, spicy taste that is so perfect for a cold winter afternoon, all snuggled up by the fireplace. I love having a cup of this with a fresh scone or a piece of pie. Honestly, it reminds me of Christmas now since I have bought this for my husband as a stocking stuffer for the last few years since he loves it so much.

Text: Delicious Tea
column5: I drink three or more cups of tea a day.  This is tea is absolutely delicious.  It has a strong cinnamon flavor.  It is best to brew the tea for at least five minutes in boiling water.  I first had it in a restaurant.  I tried to find it at  the local supermarkets, but was unsuccessful.  Fortunately, it can be ordered.

Text: Sensational
column5: I prefer loose-leaf teas, but at work the convenience of bags is hard to beat, and Harney has been reliable in the past. This "Hot Cinnamon Spice" is an excellent cold-weather tea: a pervasive cinnamon aroma with just a hint of orange, and a nice balance between the subtle spice and the tea flavors (assuming for a moment you want to taste the tea, not just the spices, that is.) I'm not fond of herbs and spices that totally overwhelm the underlying tea -- this preparation was actually better than I expected. Good packaging, even though the bags are not the top-tier sachets that Harney uses for their fanciest offerings; a great value.

Text: Excellency certified by the chai wallah.
column5: The taste of this tea is absolutely phenomenal. I grew up in southern India(Hyderabad) where tea flows like water and chai wallahs are omnipresent. It was hard for me to appreciate the choices I have in the states as far as tea is concerned (Black tea specifically) because none of the black tea I find here tastes good to me unless I turn it into chai by adding milk and spices. But this tea does not need even a crystal of sugar because the combinations of cinnamon and sweet cloves they use make it naturally sweet and it smells heavenly too. Every time I go back to India, I order a box to take with me. The tea comes in different packages. You can buy the large rectangular bags which come in shiny copper-colored tins which are not value for money compared to these individually wrapped, slightly smaller tea bags. I seep two bags in piping hot water for three minutes to reach the strong taste I like. Keep sipping! :)

Text: Tea everything I expected
column5: I love this cinnamon tea and had a hard time finding it. When I ordered it, it was sent right away. I have no complaints.

Text: Harney & Sons Hot Cinnamon Spice
column5: I have been obsessed with this tea for several years.  When the nearby coffee shop that sold it in bulk went out of business, I was thrilled to find it on Amazon for a good price.

Text: One of the best!
column5: i thought this was going to be the same taste as the ones in the tin, the satchels, which are basically the most amazing thing ever.  However, I noticed that after my tea cooled down more, I could taste the flavor more.  Still pretty comparable to the ones in the tins, just needs to brew longer and only good for one cup.

Text: Cinnamon Spice tea
column5: If you really, really love cinnamon, then this is the tea for you.  It is delicious both hot and cold.  My sister introduced me to the tea and I haven't stopped drinking it since.  Naturally sweet and delicious.

Text: Great value
column5: This cinnamon tea is great- strong, but not to the point of being spicy.  This 50 count box is much more economical than the 20 sachets, and I don't notice a taste difference.

Text: Love the taste
column5: Someone introduced me to this tea and ever since then I am in love with the taste. It has a sweet taste and the hot spice cinnamon is such a treat. I have a new favorite tea, thats for sure. I highly recommend this tea.

Text: DELICIOUS
column5: This tea is DELICIOUS!  If you love cinnamon and a hint of sweetness this is the one to buy. I drink it when I'm craving something sweet but don't want to indulge in chocolate Bravo Harney & Sons!

Text: Fantastic tea
column5: I LOVE this tea it is so full of flavor that I look forward to having it first thing in the morning.  Not too sweet, perfect combo of cinnamon and spice delicious!

Summary: Ellen Holtzman Robin "avid fan of historical
Text: Extraordinary Tea
column5: I came across Harney & Sons Hot Cinnamon Spice Tea while on vacation. It is truly the most delicious tea I've ever had - if you are a lover of cinnamon. I know there are other varieties - but this is my favorite.

Text: I love this tea!
column5: Many teas just don't have the flavor you wish for. This Harney & Sons hot cinnamon spice is fragrant and tastes divine!

Text: Possibly the best tea I've had yet.
column5: This tea is just amazing. It has a very unique taste, and if you like cinnamon at all you will love this. It is a bit strong at the recommended 1 cup per tea bag, but I'm guessing 1 & a half will be perfect. It is not overly hot like the (only) bad review says, except for maybe the fact that you may be willing to scald your tongue to drink it, its that good! One thing to note is some of the actual tea bags aren't very secure on the top, and the tea will likely pour into your cup. Might want to staple it down a bit more.

Text: My New Favorite Tea
column5: This might be my new favorite tea - the scent is just divine and it needs  very little in the way of sweetening.

Text: An experience
column5: This is more than just a tea. It truly is an experience. It has a multi-layered flavor of cinnamon and spices that are luscious. I treat myself to a cup of this tea whenever it is snowy outside, or even when I have just had a tiring day. You will love it (-:

Text: Best. Tea. Ever!!
column5: My husband and I love how spicy and sweet this tea is.  It's truly a dessert.  So glad to find this at Amazon at their price.

Text: Wonderful tea!
column5: While I love cinnamon rolls, I'm not a huge fan of red hots, cinnamon gum, etc. but this tea is delicious!  It tastes like a very mild (not hot at all) red hot.  Everyone I have served it to has loved it--even those who aren't fans of hot tea.  Please note that this is not an herbal tea--it is caffeinated and has black tea mixed in, which is delicious.

Text: The Best
column5: This is the only cinnamon tea that actually tastes like cinnamon.  It's spicy and sweet.  $0.30 a cup (shipping added) is high for an at home beverage, but I never need to use 2 tea bags for flavor.  The best on the market.

Text: Cinnamon Tea
column5: This tea is good if you really like the strong taste of cinnamon and spice. It kind of tasted like the gum, Big Red. I didn't expect the strong taste so that is why I gave it a 4. There is also a sweet after taste which was interesting too.

Text: Addicted!
column5: Most cinnamon teas are herbal. I love the blend with the black tea. It really helps me in the afternoon with a bit of caffeine vs going for coffee. I love it and buy it in bulk!

Text: A Tea That Can Take you Away
column5: I got hooked on Harney & Sons teas some time ago. It started with their Paris tea, and I imagined that I was back in Paris with every sip. So that led me to try the Hot Cinnamon Spice, the heady aroma of the cinnamon made me think of Morocco. The first sip I was transported by the smooth flavor and yet there was an intense melding of slightly sweet and hot spice. Once again, hooked. My 18 year old son loves it too! If you love tea, these teas are the best out there!

Text: Hot Tamale Tea
column5: I had this tea once at Einstein Bagel and decided that I NEEDED to find this tea. I found it on Amazon and order 2 boxes. I call it my Hot Tamale tea because it pretty much tastes exactly like the candies of the same name. I am not a tea drinker, especially not unsweetened tea, but this I can drink without adding anything to it. I love it and highly recommend it.

Text: Great cinnamon tea!
column5: This tea is exactly what I wanted - rich, warm, spicy cinnamon tea!  The tea is so well-packaged that you can't even smell the tea bag without opening the foil pouches, which means they're keeping the tea fresh.  I've brewed this tea in hot milk also for a very nice cinnamon milk tea.  Perfect tea for a chilly night and goes wonderfully with a piece of pumpkin pie.  :)

Text: Awesome!
column5: I stumbled on to the tea and flavor at the JW Marriott. I absolutely love it and was thrilled to find it on Amazon.  Mix it with honey - it is fantastic.

Text: delicious
column5: tastes like the hot cinnamon candies, good with just sugar, or even better with cream and sugar, perfect winter treat

Text: Harneys tea
column5: I had tried this tea at a spa and loved it. They shipped promptly altho 1 box of 50 tea bags arrived in a large box with foam peanuts.I feel postage could have been lowered if tea box was sent in a smaller appropriate size box. the cinnamon spice tea is delicious and as promised I received a sample of one of their other teas. I will order again.

Text: Not a fan of cinnamon, but this was DE-LIC-IOUS!
column5: I had mine in a latte style, made with milk.  SO GOOD.  Would definitely recommend trying it, even if you are not a big cinnamon fan.  I enjoy cinnamon, but I wouldn't say I love it  so don't shy away just because everyone raves about the cinnamon flavor.  It definitely feels like a fall/holiday treat with the cinnamon and spice flavor.

Text: WOW!
column5: I was going to order Bigelow again, but read the reviews for this and decided to give it a try.  This is SO good! It's like having dessert.  I'm ordering much more right now!!

Text: All as promised.
column5: The seller did everything as promised, I even got a 1 sample of mint tea.

Text: Exceptional tea
column5: I have purchased this tea at Barnes and Noble after receiving it as a gift from a friend. This tea is on the expensive side but worth it. If you like cinnamon, you will love this tea. I enjoy drinking it with an ounce or so of soy milk and agave sweetener. It's bliss and tastes like a zillion calories when it's not!

Text: TEA SO GOOD, IT CAN MAKE A TEAPOT TASTE LIKE FOOD
column5: My friend raved about this tea. She said it is the best tea on earth, world, wherever. I did not believe a word she said until recently when I personally tried it. I did not know a combination of hot, cinnamon, spice can be so delicious. Once I opened the tea pack, I can smell an aroma of cinnamon. If you love cinnamon, you can't go wrong with this tea. But if you hate cinnamon, you will want to throw this on the ground. As for myself, I love cinnamon. This tea is flavorful and different from other teas. The first sip of the tea, you will taste a bit of cinnamon. The second sip of the tea, you will taste a bit of spice. The third sip of the tea, you will taste a bit of sweetness. It is simply wonderful. You want quality tea? Harney & Sons - Hot Cinnamon Spice will not disappoint you. Okay, it's tea time.

Text: Whoever said this was crack tea they were right
column5: LOVE this tea.  I gave away a bag at work one day and the next thing I knew 3 people came by my office and I got 2 emails wanting to know where the tea with the heavenly scent came from.  JUST BUY IT!!!! I've had at least two dozen people try it and not one has disliked it. If you still uncertain go by Caribou and order their Hot Cinnamon Tea Harney is their distributor.  I must say you need to buy it in the silken sachets it's much better tasting that way but this way is darn good too.  I'm a facebook fan of Harney tea so I posted a concern that they were out and they emailed me the day it was coming back into stock and I bought a 50 ct bag  in decaf for $13.50. Low and Behold I went back the next day to add a bag and it was out again.

Text: Crack TEA
column5: What do they put in this tea? Crack? Seriously, I know flavored teas are gimmicky and blah blah fancy heritage oolong is the pinnacle of tea, but I LIKE this. It's totally flavorful and addicting! Plus, unlike chai, it doesn't need the addition of milk or honey. I'm sure they make it with crack because it makes my office smell like potpourri for several days, but I still love it.

Text: I have found the tea.
column5: This tea is fantastic.  Like another here, I am passing bags out to as many people as I can find.  This has the perfect blend of cinnamon and sweetness (without adding anything additional to the cup).  This is now the only hot tea I want or need.

Text: Harney & Sons Cinnamon Spice tea bags
column5: Shipment was prompt, product is great, shipping is a little high. Very satisfied with overall experience.

Text: Sweet Lava
column5: This is my favorite tea.  It is beautiful to the senses.  I have passed out this stuff to all my co-workers and they adore it too.  In addition, the guy selling the stuff here gives good customer service.  This tea is best paired with European sugar cubes.  I do not use milk, but I think this tea would be good with it or half and half.  The tea has clarity of taste that outshines other teas.  The quality is tops. Fall is a great time of the year to enjoy this tea.  You can not go wrong with this stuff!

Text: Best Cinanmon Tea Ever
column5: I have never tasted a cinnamon tea as flavorful as this one!  Everyone who drinks it at my house wants to know where they can buy some. It's the best.

Text: Harney & Sons hot cinnamon tea
column5: rec'd as listed, no problems except that UPS left the box on front porch in the snow, and contents got wet, including the outside box of this tea, which was a Christmas gift - the tea bags themselves are in packages that would not be affected - not at all the senders fault - rec'd quickly and before Christmas, and it was not guaranteed, so this was very nice

Text: Artificial
column5: it doesn't state artificial flavorings in the ingredients list on Amazon ..but they are listed on the box.  Not for me because of the artificial ingredients, but my husband likes the taste.

Text: undrinkable
column5: I found this tea undrinkable -- the spice flavor is way too strong for me.  "Hot" means "completely numbs your taste buds" here, not hot temperature-wise!

Text: Sweet treat
column5: THis the best on the market. Tasts like real sugar..You can just dip a strawberry in it and instant sweet treat..love it

Text: Natural, no calorie, and tastes great
column5: I've been wanting to try stevia (the plant that is used in this product) for a long time, and finally picked up this container at the grocery store.  I didn't buy it on Amazon but wanted to share my impression with other shoppers. The little jar is rather expensive, but stevia is very concentrated and you only need a tiny bit for most uses.  I like the container, with the flip top lid that allow me to use a spoon without screwing off a lid. The product itself is very nice!  I've used it for several weeks in my morning tea, and I'm a convert.  It gives my tea a nicely sweetened taste and I haven't detected any aftertaste.  I only use about 1/4 teaspoon in two cups of hot water (I have a big mug for my tea). I'm going to explore Amazon and the rest of the Internet for a bulk sized package of this sweetener.  Unfortunately it would be nearly impossible to grow my own stevia in my herb garden, so I'll have to buy it instead.

Text: Cafe Molido Santo Domingo
column5: Excellent coffee and great vendor.  I had this coffee when I was in the DR and I love that I can still drink it here at home.

Text: Super seller- very fast shipping and great product
column5: This is the most amazing coffee actually grown and processed in the Dominican Republic.  I tried it while in the DR and can't live without it since then.  It has a natural sweetness to it and is not bitter like a lot of arabica coffees can be.  This seller is great- fast shipping and excellent prices.  Thank you to the seller and for Amazon for offering this great product.

Text: disappointment
column5: I ordered "Harika Ribbon Pakoda" from amazon but instead they shipped me this product. I opened the first one and was greatly disappointed because it tasted STALE and yucky. I think it must have been in their shelves for a long time. While I love to see more Indian snacks added to amazon, I would be a repeat buyer only if the quality is there.

Text: Back in Time
column5: This was a step back in time for my daughter.  It was there on time.  Wrapped very nice and she just loved it. this company does a very good job in presenting this product.

Text: I am in love!
column5: I really, really liked these nuggets! These are akin to boneless nuggets you would find at a restaurant, but without the messy sauce. Of course, these are bagged, shelf stable nuggets - so they are a bit salty (which means you won't risk death upon eating them). I love the size of this bag as it is great for snacking - only 90 calories! The shelf life was great as mine don't expire until Dec. of 2011 (purchased Feb. of 2011). I will be keeping a pack in the car, a pack in my desk at work, and they are great for grabbing on the run for a quick snack. These are buffalo, so there is a good and HOT spice with them.  Another big thing for me is having something yummy, fun, and interesting to eat in case of an emergency (like a weather event that takes out the power). What would you want to eat - canned tuna or buffalo nuggets to get you through a power outage? See, reason enough to order - you can add them to your emergency preparedness bag - LOL.It looks expensive, but the price is actually really good. Less than you would pay in the grocery store and the smaller size bag means you don't have to refrigerate leftovers or over indulge (there is a lot of salt). I can imagine taking these camping, to sporting events, or anywhere that a "semi" healthy snack is warranted or you just get a craving for buffalo nuggets! Will definitely be purchasing more of these!

Text: awesome - great product
column5: These are perfectly spiced and absolutely addictive.  Plus, they are a great source of low-fat protein.  Yum - this is a great product!

Text: So tasty.
column5: Microwave Hamburger Buns are tasty, fast and easy.  I am now able to have bread for family, with special diet needs, at the same time as dinner is ready.

Text: Easy to use
column5: This mix makes great hamburger buns.  It is very easy to use.  Also, you only make one at a time so you eat it fresh, then make another one the next time.  With a lot of mixes you make it and then have a lot to freeze.

Text: GREAT PRODUCT
column5: Personally I find the products put out by Food Tek a welcome change to some of the horrible gluten free foods I have eaten.  Thanks Food Tek!!

Text: SUGAR IS NUMBER 2 INGREDIENT. A SUGAR BAKING MIX THAT HAS NO GLUTEN
column5: THIS CAN ONLY BE REFERRED TO AS A SUGAR BAKING MIX. The point that it has no gluten, is ridiculous when it is STOCKPILED OF SUGAR!!!!!!!!! So, instead of gluten, an individual can FATTEN THEMSELVES UP with sugar! Further, if you suffer from a sugar addiction, and gluten--- THIS IS definitely a huge let down. Sugar in any form such as malto dextrin, dextrose, organic sugar (I love it when they nickname this one as being organic as if the chemical composition is any different on the body!), WHEN ARE THE MANUFACTURERS GOING TO MAKE REAL healtlhy products that have ingredients that ARE TRULY FOR THE HEALTH CONSCIOUS. By omitting one ingredient such as gluten, you have done NOTHING to help consumers with health allergies---- instead you have dumped humongous amounts of the number ONE SUBSTANCE IN THE U.S. THAT Americans are addicted to;  sugar

Text: Ghastly Sponges in Mouth-Burning Sugar Syrup
column5: This tastes like I imagine a regular sponge would.  They look that way too.  Indeed, I am suspicious that these aren't really "cottage cheese patties" or paneer at all.  I've bought paneer for years and I know what it looks, feels and tastes like.  I've no idea what the heck this is, but I think this company is engaged in some funny business in what it's putting in the product. Beyond that, these sponges are soaked in an uber sweet sugar syrup with a slight hint of rose.  That's to be expected for an Indian sweet of this type; however, this stuff actually not only burns your tongue and throat, but mine was still burning 8 HOURS AFTER CONSUMING ONE PATTY, WHICH I HAD SQUEEZED AND RINSED WITH WATER TO REMOVE AS MUCH SYRUP AS POSSIBLE. I would strongly advise others not to purchase this product.  I was expecting something completely different than what I received.  Oh and also all the cans were heavily dented upon arrival.

Text: Podravka Liver Pate 100g
column5: Smaller than I thought but still very delicious and creamy.  Smooth tecture and excelant taste. a smoother version of liverwurst but mildly spicey --a lighter spiced liverwust for those who like less spice. Sometimes liverwurst can be quite spicey.

Text: Eh
column5: Have you ever had canned corned beef hash?  Ever open it right up and just taste it right out of the can?  This tastes like that . Unheated, canned corned beef hash . Without the hash part.

Text: Yummy
column5: If you enjoy liver pate, this one is smooth and delicious.  I like it very much, almost as much as goose liver pate!

Text: Food for Thought
column5: My holistic vet recommended this dry food for my cat, despite it being intended for dogs.  She said this is the only dry food she would ever recommend for any older dog or cat, based on its excellent nutritional balance and anti-inflammatory qualities. Following that advice, I purchased the food for my 15 year old cat, who seems to adore the flavor of it, but it's a bit too large for him to chew easily.  I'm holding out for a cat version, but until then, I will keep smashing it up for him ;)

Text: Great taste gourmet treat on a budget!
column5: First off if you are looking for one of the super dark 70%+ chocolateThe bars this is NOT for you.  The chocolate is dark, however not bitter at all and has a slightly sweet taste.  The dark, rich, full chocolate flavor is apparent and is complimented well by the creamy texture and smooth taste in the mouth. The dark chocolate bars are made in the USA in Novato, CA.  Torn Ranch is a company that supplys high end treats mainly in the hospitality market.  Might be difficult to find unless you fly first class or stay at a 5 star hotel.  You can direct order online at tornranch.com.  Though if you do these are going to set you back $3 each plus taxand shipping with a 6 bar minimum.  Amazon was 31 for 24 and no tax plus Prime as a shipping option.  A GREAT deal. Package was interesting.  The 24 came in a large, ugly, cardboard box that had been directly sent by itself to amazon,  Basically 24 loose bars in a Torn Ranch shipping box.  So if you are looking at giving this whole as a gift the package will be lacking.  They are individually packaged with each bar having a sealed plastic inner sleeve that is surrounded by a nice printed light cardboard outer box.  The chocolate is sectinal - unlike the other review these are now three piece to a bar. Very, very tastey treat that I will reorder once these 24 are gone.  However, would not reccomend youy buy this as a gift to send (all 24 at once anyway) as the packaging for ther 24 is pretty rough and not eye pleasing.

Text: The Best
column5: Torn Ranch offers the absolute best chocolate/nut products on the market.  USA-made means a lot.  Good customer service.  I am a huge fan of their Pure Dark offering, Jumbo Cashews and #1 for me is the Sea Salt Chocolate.  A great gift item.

Text: Great value!
column5: I love dark chocolate and have tried and enjoyed many of the well known brands.  I had never heard of Splendid Specialties before and there were no reviews here on Amazon to go by but I took a chance and ordered these and I'm glad I did.  These dark chocolate bars are two ounces each.  One half of the bar (a one ounce serving) is only one hundred and forty calories. The bars are thick and have a nice snap to them when you break them apart and the taste is rich, not too sweet, not bitter and very satisfying.  Delicious chocolate and a great value since you get twenty-four bars for about $1.18 per bar.  I'll be buying these again!

Text: Delicious and nutritious
column5: My husband and I tried this at the beginning of a detox program and now we are addicted.  It's tasty and ever so much better than a sports drink.

Text: delicious, but beware
column5: These are absolutely delicious.  BUT I received my order and the pretzels were all melted together in all  of the packages, so I would advise anyone wanting to purchase these GET THEM IN THE STORE, NOT FROM AMAZON.

Text: Simple but delicious
column5: Chocolate covered pretzels, something about that sweet and salty combination makes it a classic taste.  The 100 calorie packs here are perfect for on the go snacking.  Everybody loves em.

Text: 100 calorie packs Mr. Salty Choc. Covered Pretzels
column5: Could not find these in the grocery store so I was glad to find them online.  Thanks.

Text: Best 100 Calorie Snack Ever
column5: The 100 Calorie Chocolate Covered Pretzels are Delicious. My wife got me hooked on them. I am always ordering these snack. I definitely recommend this snack if you want something sweet, if you are a chocolate lover and if you watching your calorie intake like me.

Text: Tastes so good and only 100 calorie each!
column5: Great Taste in only one little pack!  They are only 100 calories per pack.  The only complaint I have about it is that they are so good, that they are gone too fast.  By the time I realized it, it's already gone.  When you want something salty and chocolatey, with little fat, then this is the snack for you!  I like chocolate covered pretzels in general, so when I found this, I was so happy.  It's not expensive either.. on Amazon.

Summary: Wandrwoman "Wise as Aphrodite, Beautiful as A
Text: Oh! Mr. Salty! Say it Aint So!
column5: To me, a chocolate covered pretzel is among the 10 best things in life. Even unadorned by a robe of rich, sweet chocolate, Mr. Salty pretzels are honored members of my junk food pantheon. When I saw these on the supermarket shelf, I grabbed a box. Note to self: some things in life are just not possible. A 100 calorie pack of chocolate covered pretzels will either contain very few pretzels or will contain very little chocolate. Nabisco chose the latter. How many little pretzel "O's" are in a 100 calorie pack? About 5 or 6. How much chocolate coating does each little "O" have? A very thin coating of not very good quality milk chocolate. I realize other reviewers have loved these, however, I found them disappointing. For a really satisfying salty-chocolate-crunchy 100 calorie treat try: Snackwell Fudge Drizzle Caramel Popcorn, 5.3-Ounce (Pack of 6).

Text: NostAlgic!
column5: As advertIsed, they have the. same great shApe and flavor as when - was little. Great little carry boxes for purse or poCket!

Summary: Desert Gypsy "A Brooklyn Girl Out West"
Text: very best tomato paste, very little waste
column5: I always keep a few tubes of this Mutti Tomato paste in my pantry. The flavor is a very fresh tasting robust tomato taste; it helps thicken and adds wonderful flavor to my soups and sauces. The label has lots of useful information, including - * ingredients: Italian tomatoes, salt.  * the recommendation refrigerate after opening and discard the unused portion after 20 days.  * a serving size is 2T and a 4.5oz tube has approximately 7 servings.  * processed using a dehydration method that results in 28% dry extract of the tomatoes  * certified as using environmentally friendly cultivation methods If it could be stored longer than 20 days (like ketchup) I would give it a fifth star but I often either store it longer than the recommended date and worry about food safety or I wind up throwing out the unused portion which is not particularly cost effective. Still, a far superior taste than any canned paste I have tried so I'll continue to buy and enjoy it.

Text: For Salty Tastemorr cheddar for sweet honeymaid delight bars
column5: Then do the sensible meal thing without compromising taste.. not difficult at all.. I lovvvvvvvve these.. I was surprised that the bar is soft and not crunchy.. was amazingly decadent and delicious .. the only downside is when I was done with it I wanted another so I ate it slowly accompanied by Lavender Earl gray tea.. a perfect marriage..

Text: "Love this bar"
column5: This bar is soo good.  It is soft, with a graham cracker crust, the chocolate center is creamy and delicious. It is just right for a quick sweet fix. And it is only 100 calorie's  what else can you ask for. Can't even find these bars anywhere but at amazon. Simply good and delicious.

Text: Great 100 Calorie Treat!
column5: These are a GREAT treat for anyone on Weight Watchers or just counting calories. I saw them reviewed by Hungry Girl and just happened to find them in a store one day and LOVED them. Unfortunately, after that I wasn't able to find them in stores again, so I am so happy to see that they are available through Amazon. I've only tried the chocolate variety, but they also come in cheesecake.

Text: Chocolate Honey Maid Delight Bars
column5: These 100 Calorie bars look way better in the photo than they taste.  They are not horrible - just not what I was hoping for.

Text: YUMMY!
column5: These are great tasting snacks.  We love the chocolate and the cheesecake flavors.  Much easier to buy on Amazon.

Text: Love these bars!
column5: This is one of the best tasting snack bars I have ever tasted!  I'm trying to lose weight and I like that these bars are only 100 cals.  They are very soft, and tastes like they are a lot more than 100 calories.  It really hits the spot when I have to have something sweet and chocolate.  It has just a touch of a flavor I can't put my finger on, it almosts tastes like coconut, but I don't think there is coconut listed in the ingredients.  But don't be fooled  to only be 100 calories, these bars are not very big.  However, they are so good, that I guess they are satisfying anyway.  I'm buying them by the case now through Amazon.com!

Text: TASTY & RELIABLE
column5: I used as a flavor enhancer (not as a 'TREAT") for our kidney failure cat and found it to be among the best.  See my separate review of CAT-MAN-DO BONITO SPRINKLES for  a summary of my experiences with over four dozen products I tried to enhance the appetite of our CRF/CKD mom-cat. I have no reason to suspect that this product would be any less effective as a treat.

Text: Great Product but Misleading
column5: On the picture on the box I assumed this lollipop was round and looked like cotton candy but it is a flat lollipop.It has a great taste but the pictures are misleading.

Text: OK beans not the best around
column5: The beans were kind of very dry. Wasn't very easy to work with. However at the price you couldn't beat them during that time.

Text: Very Good Quality
column5: Needed these for several different dishes.  Very nice product.  I would order these again.  Thanks

Text: Madagascar Vanilla Beans
column5: The vanilla beans were fresh when I received them with an outstanding flavor.  I made homemade vanilla ice cream and using store bought would have never worked. Thanks

Text: Madagascar Vanilla beans
column5: I ordered these vanilla beans and waited for them to arrive. I finally wrote a review about them when they didn't come on time. I received a note from Java guy and he replaced the order very quickly. He is very honest and the beans are beautiful.  I woule like some recipes to go with the beans. Java guy did send me a couple of suggestions for using the beans.  These beans do not smell like Vanilla though. Is there another bean that has the smell of Vanilla?  Thanks very much for your quick reply to my complaint. Sincerely: Wanda

Text: She LOVES them!
column5: My dog can't get to the kitchen fast enough for one of these (almost knocking me over in the process lol), when I ask if she wants a sausage. Merrick, you've created a monster! My picky pittie's favorite treat; and, every flavor is a winner!

Text: Review/Feedback
column5: Awsome product. Highly recomended as a treat or a food substitute. Also Great for mixing with dry dog food.

Text: Rotten and covered in mold
column5: I decided that i should first research how to germinate acorns, they said you should soak them in hot water for 24 hours. I did. None of the seeds sunk, I know that it is not a completely reliable method to prove the viability of the seeds, but still! out of the 10 acorns that I bought, none sunk! They floated like dead fish. So I decided to open with a hammer 3 acorns to check their appearance. 2 out of the 3 were completely rotten with mold covering their entire surface. I would definitively not buy these seeds again! However, I have bought several species in excellent condition from this seller, that germinated.

Text: Fizzy Juice, yum
column5: The peach flavor of Knudsen Spritzers is one of their best (i also recommend strawberry and mango fandango).  The soda doesn't contain any added sugar or other undesirables.  While the main juice isn't peach juice (most of their spritzers are predominantly grape or apple juices) it does have enough peach juice to give it a distinct peach flavor.  Some people may find these spritzers a little too sweet.  I like to drink mine with ice or a little seltzer added.  I've tried other competing brands and find these spritzers the best all-juice sodas out there.

Text: Peach Spritzer from Amazon
column5: I love that I can get the Knudsen Peach Spritzer on Amazon, because I can only find it at one store in my city of 80,000 people. I am especially pleased that I can have a case sent to me automatically on a turnaround of my choosing. I believe the Peach flavor is the nearest to the actual fruit flavor of all the spritzers, and is the most refreshing. Having free shipping means I can better afford to keep this product on hand.R.W. Knudsen Spritzer, Peach, 10.5-Ounce Cans (Pack of 24)

Text: Best Ice Cream EVER!
column5: I had this ice cream once. It was the best ice cream I had ever had in my life. Its so smooth and creamy. Everyone I made it for enjoyed it a lot. I can't believe they don't sell this in more stores. I would really enjoy purchasing many of these, but it seems amazon has  made a mistake in the shipping weight. This error will cause your shipping to be just as much if not more than the ice cream itself. I have tried calling and emailing with no response. They say the package of 12 boxes is 10lbs. Well, as you can see, each box is approximately 4oz each. About 1/4 of a pound. So 12 boxes would only be about 3lbs. Not 10lbs.Hopefully writing this review will get the problem solved. I would really love to purchase this ice cream soon.

Text: Yummy
column5: If you have a Cuisinart or other home ice cream maker, very easy to make good chocolate ice cream with the Junket Mix. Even good using non-fat milk. Just mix milk and contents of Junket package-25 minutes later-you have ice cream. Can be eaten right away or stored in freezer. Quick delicious dessert for a dinner party as it can be freezing while the main course is being eaten.  Also add-ins such as nuts, chopped candy bars, and fruit make it even more special.  Try toasted almonds with Mounds candy bar.

Text: Junket Ice cream
column5: This is a great inexpensive mix.  We use Lactaid brand milk to make ice cream for my lactose intolerant family members.  Fun and easy, with or without an ice cream maker!

Text: The Secret Ingredient
column5: This little box contains a brown chocolaty powder.  The instructions tell you to add two things: whole milk and whipping cream.  By itself, whole milk and whipping cream, with a little sugar and frozen, IS ice cream.  So what does this little box give you that some sugar and powdered cocoa doesn't? I have no idea, but it's worth it. Whatever is in this powder does two things you won't get from the plain ingredients alone: volume, and thickness.  The ice cream was thickening so quickly that what should have taken 20 minutes to reach was thick enough to overwhelm my electric machine in 10.  The volume more than doubled over the liquid base, which is about 50% more than with plain ingredients.  These alone make it worth it. Flavor-wise, there are no complaints.  It's chocolaty and sweet  nothing spectacular, but no worse than you'd get out of your store freezer.

Text: soft ice cream mix
column5: tasty rich chocolate flavor cant wait to try vanilla & strawberry  Fast delivery well packaged easy to make  depending on machine is how to get a best cone

Text: Delicious
column5: Made in a Lello. Easy mix Freezes well & holds to a cone Tastes better than commercial. I'm well into the second 12 pack.

Text: Junket gets it done
column5: Junket has been around for decades.  I saw my great grandmother use it for ice cream.  Recently we saw it advertised and bought a small case of it.  We were amazed at how great the chocolate Ice Cream Mix came out.( the one we bought)  It was awesome and lightning fast without the egg custard necessary for good quality ice cream. We even used just whole milk and no cream and it was great ice cream..We recommend this product for those that want a quick treat or a handsome dessert done done up just before dinner guests arrive.  You do have to use two of the small boxes for a good quart but Who knew?

Text: Junket is Still the best
column5: Junket Ice Cream Mix is great.  I have always loved it, but our stores stopped carrying it. Buying online was no problem and I was happy to find it.  It is still the best ice cream mix on the market.

Text: Outstanding Product
column5: This product was every bit a good as some of the "best" brands.  The chocolate was rich and smooth.  I made it in my ice cream maker and it was outstanding.. I also made it by following the instructions on the box and the results were just as good.. I would recommend this product!

Text: Junket - a blast from the past
column5: I remembered Junket mix from my childhood so I searched the Internet to find if it was still being made. Voila, of course and of course Amazon had it. I love it. Mix it up and put it in my ice cream maker, turn on the machine and shortly enjoy great ice cream. Yummm.

Text: i expected it to be bigger then it was however its worth the 26 dollars
column5: not as big as it looks but was worth the money. everything in the box is really small not much to it. for 26 dollars not bad tho you get what you pay for

Text: a good assortment of different things
column5: This box isn't HUGE, but it's not tiny either.  I got it because of the variety of items it seemed to have, and it didn't disappoint. That being said: because it has 27 items or whatever, all of the items are pretty small (I was expecting this, so I'm NOT lowering it's ranking for this).  If you're looking for a large amount of meat and cheese, I'd get something else, as while the meat and cheese were both very good, the logs were small and went fairly quickly.  The sweet things in it were quite good as well, and offered something different to eat- and the sweet/hot mustard was loved by all. My only complaint was that the only item that was either 1. not liked at all or 2. simply "ok" to most people that were eating out of this (6 people) was the Spice Cheese, which seems to be the only item that is repeated- as I believe there were a total of 3 of them in the box.  If you really liked the Spice Cheese, however, that might make your day.  The replication of that one item instead of putting in something else twice, or something different, is the only reason I'm giving this 4 instead of 5 stars. In short: very good variety, though small items.

Text: Swiss Colony 27 favorites
column5: My Swiss Colony 27 favorites was received in the time advertised and in the best of shape. My family and friends dove right in on the day received and we found the product fresh and Delicious as well as plentiful.  Thank You for a wonderful product at a more than reasonable price!

Text: Good for the value
column5: I sent this as a gift so I cannot comment on it too much. I do know that my friends were very pleased once they received it. It arrived on the date it said it would.

Text: Good last minute
column5: This was a great last minute Christmas present,  As I procrastinated almost to late. But Thank You  It got there on time. I ordered three of them and sent them to three  \different people, so it worked out great.

Text: very nice presentation
column5: I thought this this was very nice (to give as a gift) But as the other person said The shipping label took the gift idea to a new level. I will never order this again for a gift, but just in case anyone else gets stuck with this because of the label, this is what I did--I took a small xmas gift bag and cut out a santa picture and pasted it over where I had peeled off the shipping label, so now it looked more like a gift!!

Text: Great Gift - fast shipping
column5: Ordered this for a Christmas gift just a few days ago and wasn't sure if it would make it to the recipient before Christmas (going Super Saver shipping via USPS). Just got a call that it arrived today in great condition and they are loving it - a wonderful variety of items that all taste good. Guess I've got a new Christmas tradition

Text: Gift Box Doubles as Shipping Carton
column5: Regardless as to how good or bad the food items are I don't consider this to be a 'gift box' as a 4x7 inch non-removable shipping label was slapped on top of the box. As I was giving this to a friend for Christmas I attempted to remove the label. The holiday box design came up in strips along with the label. As one pays a premium for these food samples one does so because they are arranged and displayed attractively and come in a 'gift box' to be given as gifts.

Text: Yogurt lovers rejoice!!!
column5: For absolutely the best Yogurt, Bakto rocks. To 16 oz. Chobani lo-fat plain yogurt drizzle 8 cc (1 1/2 tsp) Orange extract, 1 cc Bakto Vanilla Ext and wait 10 minutes (to let the alcohol evaporate). Add 3 tiny scoops of Kal stevia, MIX and refridgerate. A healthy, lo-cal, sugar free masterpiece.

Text: Delicious! Great Packaging. Quick Delivery.
column5: Natural Orange Extract (1 FL OZ)Pack of 3 I ordered the set of 3 Orange extracts, each is a 1 ounce bottle. This product arrived in excellent condition due to great packaging. The scent is wonderful, and the flavor delicious. The delivery took only 4 days. I will order from Bakto Flavors again!

Text: This tea was yummy.
column5: Will purchase again!  It was less expensive online but could probably find in stores everywhere now.  Amazon has great deals.  Just gotta look.

Text: Very nice green tea
column5: This is a very nice, full flavored green tea. Also very convient in the K-Cup packaging. I have tasted some lose leaf premium green tea that is a little better, but much more expensive and not in K-Cup style.

Text: Tea Tottler!
column5: I am not a coffee drinker, so tea is my thing.  With the Keurig machine, it makes it all the more easier to get a cup of tea.

Text: Tasty, but didn't delete my need for a Starbucks run.
column5: These k-cups taste good and are great for a quick Chai fix. They're also a good coffee alternative, but they not good enough to replace my Starbucks stop for a Chai latte or an Apple Chai.

Text: Excellent Flavor
column5: This Chai Tea has excellent flavor and I have enjoyed many Chai Teas. This one for Keurig is by far one of the best I have enjoyed over the years. Thanks.

Text: Morning Beverage
column5: An excellant tea for Keurig Brewers   Did I mention that Amazon is the only place I can get many of the brewing cups for Keurig Brewer!

Text: love this tea
column5: I've always purchased this tea in bags. Wanted to see if it tasted the same in the kcups. I really do love this tea but it is economicly better to by it by the bags. kcups are great and convenient but just a bit more than I want to spend right now ..

Text: Good, but
column5: I like it, but . there's a little bit too much of a sharp after taste. Even adding a ton of sugar didn't make up for it entirely. The product still has good flavor, but I'd gladly take Lipton Spiced Chai over this, if only the Lipton came in a K-Cup.

Text: Celestial Seasonings Devonshire English Breakfast Black Tea
column5: I highly recommend the English Breakfast Black Tea. I'm not real big on tea most of the time but I give this one 5 stars. Don't be shy and try it.

Text: Tasty Chai tea
column5: I was skeptical thinking this tea might not have a bold enough flavor.  It is instead very flavorful with just the right amount of spice.

Text: English Breakfast tea
column5: Celestial Seasons has one of my favorite K-Cup teas in English Breakfast tea.  I am a repeat customer in buying this brand of tea.

Text: Great tea/better price
column5: Sometimes it's hard to find good quality products for the K-cups. This is a good tea. I love green tea and this is a good brand. I like this brand and Bigelow organic green tea. I think the Bigelow is my slight favorite, but this is good tea. No aftertaste and nor are there grounds in the bottom of the cup. The price on this one puts everything to shame. Usually the K-cups are more expensive, so this is a bargain. Get it now.

Text: Wonderful flavor
column5: This tea reminds me of the spicy Christmas concoctions my mother made years ago. Fresh and spicy, but not hot-spicy, it's wonderful served hot or cold.

Text: Great Green Tea
column5: This is an excellent green tea. I enjoy this brand and one from Biglow. I would recommend this tea to anyone who likes green tea. And it is organic for those of you who are into that stuff.

Text: Very Strong
column5: I generally like Chai Tea, however, this one is very, very strong for use in the Keurig. I would suggest watering it down or something.

Text: Perfect Chai taste!
column5: This tea is bold and smooth at the same time.  If you are a lover of Chai, buy this. Easy to use with Keurig and no artificial sweetners or additions to take away from the tea.

Text: green tea dream easy quick great hot or cold
column5: Love it .so quick .I can fix it if I want it hot or if i am in the mood for a cold drink. I do recommend you give it a try .

Text: Better than Starbucks!
column5: I love this stuff! I add sugar and half and half and get a drink that is very much like Starbucks Chai Latte. The price on the product has gone up since I ordered it on Jan. 7th 2011 -- so, I ordered the CS Indian Spice Chai tea bags instead. I put 2 teabags in MY K-Cup and it tastes exactly the same. You get 6 boxes of 20, so that is 60 servings for me (2 bags at a time) for the 13.95 (subscribe and save) these cups used to be. If I want the tea a bit stronger, I will remove the tea bags after brewing from the my k-cup and throw them in my mug. Let is steep a bit longer and it is wonderful!

Text: Calming and flavourful
column5: I like Indian chai tea and this teas was very flavourful, not too strong easy to work in my new Cuisinart coffee machine.

Text: Celestial Green Tea with White Tea for smooth taste is a win!
column5: The BEST green tea I have ever tasted. Extremely smooth and great taste! Tastes better than from a tea bag!

Text: NIcely Spiced
column5: This is the only chai brand that i've tried so far but it seems to be very good. nicely spiced. not to strong or weak.

Text: India spice tea
column5: I was thinking this would be a nice break from the normal tea.  However it is a bit too spicy for my taste. Unless you really like the spice chai, I wouldn't recommend this tea.

Text: Not a latte
column5: Be sure when you order this product that you do not want the latte. It was my first order with the K-Cups and I ordered the wrong thing.

Text: Celestial Chai Tea
column5: This tea taste and smells awful and there is no return, be careful before you buy it, try a smaller version of it.

Text: Celestial Seasonings India Spice Chai
column5: What I was expecting was a chai tea similar to one I find in popular coffee houses: a spiced tea infused with cream and sugar. This tea smells wonderful but the taste when you are drinking it is very plain to me. Also it is missing the cream and sugar elements so it has none of the flavor and body of a coffee house chai. I've also tried three other chais from Timothy's, Bigelow and Gloria Jean's and had the same reaction to them all during my side by side taste test. The K-cup chais are simply not the same as the coffee house chais. To approximate the coffee house chai you'll need to add your own cream/milk and sugar/honey and give it a little shake.

Text: expensive and a waste of plastic
column5: $15 for 24 servings??  that is crazy, especially that you can get green teas in a box cost a few bucks.  Also, the plastic cups go in landfill.  i will never buy these cups again.

Text: Delicious with 5 spice aromas, not full of sugar and cream
column5: This India Spice Chai while brewing fills the whole room with wonderful aromas of nutmeg, cinnamon, ginger, and cloves almost like the Chinese 5 spice blend. There is no added sugar or cream so if you want that go with Cafe Escapes Chai Latte K-Cups for Keurig Coffee Machines - 16 Pack. Those k-cups which are delicious as well have the cream that many expect in a chai tea. This particular brand of Celestial Seasonings is just tea. You can add what you want after the fact. I've not had any trouble with the packaging, nor having the tops flop off while brewing. This is just a nice cup of spiced tea. It's not peppery and won't offend or be too spicy for most. I really like it and highly recommend.

Text: Converted me to tea over coffee - it's that good
column5: Before buying my Keurig brewer, I never really like black tea.  I would drink herbal tea from tme to time but black tea always seemed too bitter.  After trying Celestial Seasonings English Breakfast Tea, I was instantly converted.  There is no bitter taste and it's so much less acidic than coffee and therefore much easier on my stomach.  It has a mild, slightly fruity taste that is perfect with breakfast or really anytime of day.  I've tried it plain and with a bit of milk and sugar as well.  I honestly have become more of a tea drinker than coffee drinker since trying this delicious tea.

Text: One, two, chai, chai, chai!
column5: The India Spice Chai is delicious!  I usually buy the Chai Latte (which I love), but decided to try the Chai tea.  This is not a creamy drink like the Chai Latte.  It is a regular tea.  The spice blend is delicious.  The aroma is divine!  Try this, you won't be sorry.

Text: Great Flavor
column5: I drink this tea nearly every day (sometimes twice) and really like the flavor.  With the health benefits of green tea, and the convenience of the Keurig, I drink more of it now than I used to when I did the wait/brew/wait/brew thing with old fashioned tea.  I highly recommend it.

Text: Yum
column5: Yum Yum Yum   I love Chai Tea and this was closest to Starbucks.  Of course I dress it up with a bit of almond milk.

Text: Excellent tea!
column5: I love my Keurig and use it every day, several times a day. My mum was born in England and is VERY particular about the taste of her tea. I got her to try this and she really liked it. I love it! True tea lovers will like this tea. It is the only K cup tea I will drink.

Text: The best tea I've had
column5: I'm not a hot tea connoisseur, but I am a big iced tea drinker and occasional hot tea drinker.  These K-cups makes some of the best tea I've had anywhere and I've started to actually crave it.  I set the brewer for 12 ounces and it makes the tea about the right strength for my taste.  The 8 ounce setting also does fine.  Highly recommended.

Text: Great Tea!!
column5: This green tea is delicious. My new diet calls for green tea or coffee only. I am not a coffee drinker and usually drink ice tea. This green tea is perfect hot or cold! I use Stevia and it taste perfect. With the cooler months upon us, this will make a great hot drink to sip on not to mention the benefits of green tea! Buy it you won't be disappointed!

Text: Great substiture for AM coffee.
column5: Taste is what it's all about and this tea not only tastes very good but is a welcome change to the morning coffee.  These Green Tea cups (IMHO )provide just the right brewing strength. Another plus is that you don't have to wait for the tea to brew. Using the 10oz setting is just right for me. If you want a stronger brew then use the 8oz setting.

Text: Where's The Cardamon?  Prepare for the Cloveaload!
column5: If the only chai you know is from a chai flavored latte at a coffee shop, this might be a good tea for you.  If you have an Indo-Pakistani family like me, the first thing you'll say after tasting this is "this is NOT chai tea."  There isn't even the slightest hint of cardamon in this tea.  As it is, it should be called "spicy clove tea."  This tea is heavily seasoned with cloves--I can't agree with any of the reviews that talk about cinnamon or other spices.  It's just cloves, cloves, and more cloves.  I guess that's what I get for looking for a simple chai-flavored tea. Real chai contains Milk, Sugar, loose black tea, cardamon, and a tiny amount of other spices according to region.  Cardamon and strong tea should be the dominant flavors.  Check the wikipedia article on Masala Chai for the original chai and how the American chai is a just a strange revision.  I'm sure that my fellow sugar-loving Americans would love to have a cup of super-sweet traditional chai, so I don't really understand why the flavor has been changed so drastically. I was hoping to add milk and sugar to this to get a "traditional" Indian Chai, but I'm going to have to try again with another brand.  For all the people out there who know what Indo-Pakistani Chai tastes like, I'll be reviewing each of the "chai" K-Cups according to how they resemble the original.

Text: Great for regular chai or latte
column5: I love this chai, and it makes a much better chai latte than I've tried in any k-cup before.  To be clear, this doesn't come with powdered milk or cream, so you have to add your own cream in order to make it a latte. I have disliked all of the pre-mixed latte k-cups I've tried because of a combination of artificial sweatener (which they all seem to insist on adding) and the powdered creamer (which is worse than fresh).  I add my own sugar and cream to this chai, and it is delicious! When I tried this without cream and sugar, it tasted slightly heavy on the clove.  With the cream and sugar, though, I don't have any complaints.

Text: Hate this :(
column5: I love Chai Tea.  I don't even put sugar or honey in my Chai Tea.  This was just not right.  Tasted burnt out of the keurig and the cloves are overpowering.  No amount of honey and milk could make this right for me.  I am suffering through my 24-pack and may just throw it out.  Very disappointing.  I've had this brand/flavor in the bags before (although not recently) and liked it just fine.  Even bought it multiple times.  Not sure what is not working right with the k-cup formula.

Text: Great Tea!
column5: Just received my new coffee maker as a gift. One of the sample K-Cups was this black tea. I set it at 8 ounces.It was so delicious, with a bit of sugar and a bit of cream. I love Red Label English Breakfast Tea and this was as good or even better. Do not be afraid of this tea, you will not regret it. No bitter bite from over processing, just yummmmmmmmm!

Text: Great tea
column5: I prefer tea that is not steeped too long. This tea is the closest I have found to the way I would make it myself. I run it through the Keurig twice, once at 10oz and once at 12 oz and it comes out exactly the way I like it. You may not prefer as weak a tea, but that can be solved by running it through only once.  It has a clean, refreshing flavor.

Text: Best Breakfast Tea
column5: I drink this every morning with a tablespoon of sugar. Great tea with just the right amount of caffeine to survive the long, early mornings. Strongly recommend.

Text: Best Cup of Tea!!
column5: I received a Keurig machine for Christmas, so I purchased this tea yet I wasn't expecting much. Well I found that this makes the BEST CUP OF TEA!! I have to pace myself because I could just drink cup after cup it is that good!!

Text: Tea Time
column5: This black tea is delicious and I have found that reusing the cup doesn't affect the flavor until the 4th or 5th cup.

Text: taste great!
column5: I love this tea! My wife is usually the big tea drinker in the house but after trying this in my Keurig I have to say I LOVE it. I didn't purchase through amazon though because I got the same amount 24 in a box for only 9.99 elsewhere but I would recommend it to anyone.

Text: Weak Flavor
column5: I love k-cups. They're pretty cool, and I like the idea of them, but I don't like sacrificing the flavor just for the sake of a cup. The tea tastes very watered down for some reason. And I am a tea drinker who doesn't add sugar/honey because I enjoy the natural sweetening properties in the actual herbs. But this herbal tea is missing something, especially with a name like 'Authentic Green Tea'. It's pretty disappointing for the price of these things, but I'll continue to drink it until I run out.

Text: Delicious tea
column5: I have always wanted to try brewing real English tea. I bought these for my Keurig, and they were so, so much better than my normal tea bags.  They may not be as good as real, brewed tea, but I think they're delicious.

Text: Great Tea
column5: Great tea and a great bargain if you own a K cup machine. Buy your coffee or tea at Amazon. The prices are great and the service is great. Ordering from Amazon direct is seamless.

Text: Good Black Tea
column5: This is my favorite tea for the Keurig brewer.  I do not like, and therefore don't drink, flavored tea.  This is the tea I prefer.  I have not been able to get in stores lately so I ordered online.

Text: Tea
column5: I use this tea as an ice tea instead of a breakfast tea. It is really refreshing and allows me to make one cup of ice tea at a time. If you find it a little strong you can add more ice or ice water.

Text: Just Plain Good!
column5: I love this tea and I am not really a tea person, but this is a great drink and it is a very tasty treat.

Text: A little weak at the 12 oz mug, but still tasty
column5: I use the Keurig Platinum (B70) brewer and the 12 oz. brew size. This K-Cup is a little weak at the 12 oz. size, but still enjoyable, as I usually make it a latte. For comparison, a Tazo Chai tea bag makes a slightly stronger cup at 12 oz than the Celestial Seasonings K-Cup. Compared to Timothy's Chai K-Cup, Celestial's Chai is stronger (which I prefer).

Text: Disappointed!
column5: Wanted to sample the K-cups. Previously a "tea bag" user for the same product.  Will stick with the tea bags, as the tea is not only more fragrant, but extremely flavorful. Will not purchase K-cups again.

Text: Indian Spice Chai
column5: This is a very nice chai doesn't taste like I thought it would..has a very strong spice taste..but still very good.

Text: great tea
column5: this tea is wonderfully spicy.  great on a cold afternoon! It would also be lovely with milk, but I prefer it plain.

Text: licorice taste, twinings chai is much better
column5: I am really disappointed in this chai tea. It has a distinct licorice taste. Twinings chai tea is much better. Do not buy unless you like a licorice taste.

Text: Celestial Chia Tea
column5: This Tea is really good. It comes in an easy to use container.  Its not very sweet so if you want your tea really sweet you may need to add something. Good produxt.

Text: I love Chai tea
column5: This is very good and makes the house smell wonderful.  I would defintely recommend this to anyone just wanting a quick tea.

Text: Favorite K Cup Overall
column5: This is my favorite K Cup overall!  I love the flavor the the tea and it brews just right on the medium setting.

Text: Celestial India spice chai tea k-cups
column5: I brew this in a keurig 60 model, i like this tea, its good any time of the year. It is on the spicy side and will leave your pallet with a spicy after taste. But oh so good late at night. Good tea for every once in a while, i could not drink this every day as is a little on the strong side.

Text: My favorite tea!
column5: This tea is the reason why I bought a Keurig. It's my absolute favorite. I make a cup each morning to take with me to work (anyone who works a 9-5 needs a pick me up!). I usually re-order two boxes every couple of months, and my package always arrives quickly. I'll be buying these k-cups as long as they're available!

Text: Great Cup of Chai
column5: This is the best Chai I have found for my Keurig. It is not overly sweet like another kind I tried. It smells and tastes wonderful. Great on a cold night!

Text: Not good
column5: This is not even tea, it is not even as good as dipping a tea bag in the cup once. It's You'll be drinking hot water with sugar and honey.

Text: My wife loves this stuff
column5: I get this for my wife who really loves it.  I am not a tea drinker, other than ice tea.

Text: Good Tea
column5: This is a good Strong Tea. The Flavor is a nice blend not to strong and not weak. Smells great when brewing. You can add milk or drink it plain.

Text: Tastes great!
column5: Great tea for the Keurig.  We love it!  Now for a good cocoa and apple cider.(Don't get the Green Mountain cider)

Text: Very weak taste ..
column5: I have purchased the Celestial Seasonings Chai Tea tea bags in the grocery store, and was impressed with the flavor. So when I saw they had them in the K-cups, I immediately jumped on them and ordered a box. I was so disappointed in it. It tastes nothing like their regular tea bag version. Weak is a word I would use. And I'm not sure what kind of spices they put it in, but it's nothing like any other chai tea I've had. I do not recommend this brand. If you're a regular chai drinker, you will notice the difference and likely be disappointed.

Text: Potent!
column5: This stuff is surprisingly strong and potent. I've always had a problem with chai tea bags because they brew such a dilute cup of tea. But with the Celestial Seasonings Keurig chai, the tea is dark and opaque. I got a huge buzz off of the caffeine. Best of all, it's pure tea and spices, unlike the Cafe Escapes Chai Latte, which is full of artificial ingredients.

Text: Clove flavor?
column5: I like the tea - but I noticed both an aroma and flavor of clove? I don't think this is ONLY green tea. That being said, I like it and most likely will reorder.

Text: Couldn't even finish one cup
column5: I'm an avid chai drinker--many different varieties of both lattes and straight black tea.  We purchased this product because we noticed that the Cafe Escapes chai lattes--a sweeter, creamier blend--did not actually have much black tea in it, and we still wanted our morning caffeine.  Neither my husband nor I could finish one mug of this stuff, and we will end up getting rid of the box.  It was that awful. There was none of the subtle spice blending--just a watery slightly clove-tasting flavor undercut by a bitterness that almost had hints of coffee. Adding a little milk, as we usually do, didn't help at all.  If you enjoy chai, I'd recommend Bigalow or Tazo and skip this one.

Text: Not strong enough
column5: Smells nice but the flavor is weak.  I don't think the Keurig brewers really work for tea.  Good tea needs to be steeped, not just filtered like coffee.

Text: Cloves Overpowering
column5: There is a very strong clove flavor in this tea. I like my tea black and did not enjoy it very much. My friend from work added cream and sugar to it and thought it was great.

Text: Yummy Tea
column5: I usually order Twinings tea, but I thought I'd try something different. This Celestial Seasonings version of English Breakfast is very good, and I will make it part of my usual rotation.

Text: Best Variety
column5: I've tried several brands of black tea and I liked this one the most because I liked the taste of it:  A) plain  B) with sugar  C) with lemon - iced or hot  D) cream  The others I tried had a slight (to me) floral taste that didn't mix well with cream or lemon.

Text: The best that I've tried of the K-Cup tea offerings
column5: I've been drinking tea for years mostly for health reasons.  We recently bought a Keurig so I tried this black tea with our new brewer.  It had a nice full body taste and I found it had a better taste than the green tea varities I tried.

Text: OMG!
column5: THIS IS SO GOOD!  I've had it hot and iced and am in love!  The chai flavor isn't overpowering, but you certainly know you are drinking a spiced tea!  I will definitely reorder!

Text: Very Good Iced tea too
column5: I did not like any of the brew over iced tea flavors so i tried this and love it.  Would definately recommend for iced or hot tea.

Text: Delicious tea
column5: I have always wanted to try brewing real English tea. I bought these for my Keurig, and they were so, so much better than my normal tea bags.  They may not be as good as real, brewed tea, but I think they're delicious.
